translation.en: Getting an early start on lunch?
translation.zh: 准备早点吃午餐吗？

translation.en: Nope. I'm working on something new, butternut squash risotto for Christmas.
translation.zh:
不 我在研究新菜肴
圣诞胡桃南瓜烩饭

translation.en: It sounds delicious.
translation.zh: 听上去很美味啊

translation.en: Tried it last night, but the ingredient ratios were all messed up.
translation.zh: 昨晚试过一次 但配料比例一团糟

translation.en: Keep getting distracted. By what?
translation.zh:
-我总是心不在焉
-为什么？

translation.en: So I'm partway through this painting, and I was finishing it in my head now.
translation.zh:
我有幅画还没画完
脑子里一直想着如何结尾

translation.en: You can't let your painting be the cause of wasted food.
translation.zh: 你不能因为绘画浪费食物

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: How would you like to rustle us up some breakfast?
translation.zh:
你能凑活着给我们做顿早餐吗？ 你觉得自己可以
做你父亲的烟熏三文鱼炒蛋吗？

translation.en: Can you make your father's smoked salmon scrambled eggs?
translation.zh:
你觉得自己可以
做你父亲的烟熏三文鱼炒蛋吗？

translation.en: I can. Can't make it as well as he did, though.
translation.zh: 可以 但没办法做得像他那样好吃

translation.en: Yes, you can.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: Your father would be so proud of you
translation.zh: 你父亲一定会为你挺身而出

translation.en: the way you've just stepped in and made this restaurant your own.
translation.zh: 你父亲一定会为你挺身而出 继承下这家餐馆而感到骄傲

translation.en: Smoked salmon it is.
translation.zh: 那就做烟熏三文鱼吧

translation.en: You should paint a picture of yourself to go with your picture of your father.
translation.zh:
你应该画一张自己的画像
和你父亲的这张放在一起

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 还是算了

translation.en: I didn't even want you to put up the photograph of me.
translation.zh: 我都不想让你贴出我的照片

translation.en: I'm no equal of Dad.
translation.zh: 我没爸爸那么有能力

translation.en: And it's pretty apparent that the customers agree.
translation.zh: 显然顾客也同意这点

translation.en: Stop that.
translation.zh: 别这么说

translation.en: It's getting steadily better, and Christmas is always great for us.
translation.zh:
你的水平在慢慢提高
圣诞节期间我们的生意一向很好

translation.en: Oh, I got to go to town and meet Ella to take care of something.
translation.zh: 我得去城里见艾拉 处理点事情

translation.en: -I'll be back for lunch service. -Just come back in time for Ella's shift.
translation.zh:
-我会及时回来 负责午餐服务
-艾拉上班时回来就行

translation.en: The staff can look after the kitchen for lunch. Have fun!
translation.zh:
员工能应对好午餐期间的厨房工作
好好玩吧

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Why are we here?
translation.zh: 我们为什么来这里？

translation.en: This is my happy place.
translation.zh: 这是我的乐园

translation.en: You okay? The walls are empty.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？墙上什么都没有

translation.en: Yeah, but can't you feel the artist creating art for the contest?
translation.zh:
是的 但你感觉不到
艺术家在为比赛创作吗？

translation.en: If you say so.
translation.zh: 如果你这么说的话

translation.en: You love creating dishes. That's your art.
translation.zh: 你喜欢制作新菜肴 那就是你的艺术

translation.en: I mean, I do too, but…
translation.zh: 我也喜欢 但是…

translation.en: -You think I'm a good chef? -You're terrific.
translation.zh:
-你觉得我是个好厨师吗？
-你特别棒

translation.en: Then why is this my happy place?
translation.zh: 那为什么这里才是我的乐园？

translation.en: Because you have a soul of a painter.
translation.zh: 因为你有着画家的灵魂

translation.en: Soul of a painter?
translation.zh: 画家的灵魂？

translation.en: Okay, I saw it in a movie, but it fit the moment, didn't it?
translation.zh:
我在电影里看到过这种说法
但用在这里很合适 对吧？

translation.en: So where's your happy place? You know, the restaurant.
translation.zh:
-那你的乐园在哪里？
-你知道的 在餐馆里

translation.en: The day you moved me from desserts to sous chef
translation.zh:
你把我从甜点师
提拔为副主厨的那一天

translation.en: was the second best day of my life.
translation.zh: 是我一生中第二美好的一天

translation.en: Well, I'm sure your husband would be happy to hear he beat sous chef.
translation.zh:
你丈夫要是知道自己比副主厨重要
一定会很开心

translation.en: Gabe supports my dreams. You need someone like that.
translation.zh: 加布支持我的梦想 你需要一个他那样的人

translation.en: After the disaster that was Jeff, I'm fine alone.
translation.zh:
和杰夫闹成那样后
我还是一个人比较好

translation.en: And I have a lot going on. I started painting again.
translation.zh:
而且我有很多事要应对
我又重拾画笔了

translation.en: Well then…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: you need to submit to the art festival.
translation.zh: 你一定要去参加艺术节

translation.en: -That's why we're here. -Consider me shocked.
translation.zh: 所以我们才来这里 这真是令我始料未及

translation.en: I took over the restaurant about a year ago,
translation.zh:
我一年前接手了餐厅
妈妈说它现在逐渐恢复了元气

translation.en: and Mom said it's starting to come back, so I thought, "Why not?"
translation.zh:
我一年前接手了餐厅
妈妈说它现在逐渐恢复了元气 所以我想：“有何不可呢？”

translation.en: Do you ever wonder what would have happened
translation.zh: 你有没有想过 如果你毕业后

translation.en: if you went straight to art school after graduation
translation.zh: 直接去上艺术学校

translation.en: rather than sticking around the restaurant?
translation.zh: 而不是坚守餐厅会是怎样？

translation.en: Well, Charlie's Kitchen isn't just a restaurant. It's my family's lifeblood.
translation.zh:
查理厨房不只是一家餐厅
还是我家人的命脉

translation.en: I can never leave it behind. Especially now.
translation.zh: 我永远不能抛弃那里 特别是在现在

translation.en: If you're looking for support,
translation.zh: 如果你想要些鼓励

translation.en: I absolutely believe you could win this art competition.
translation.zh:
我坚信你可以获得
这场艺术比赛的冠军

translation.en: Come on! You know it's true!
translation.zh: 拜托！你知道我说得没错！

translation.en: I started something. It's very Christmas-y.
translation.zh:
我已经开始画了
是很有圣诞氛围的一幅画

translation.en: No, no, wait. I have a better idea. You could paint me.
translation.zh: 不 等等 我有个更好的主意 你可以画我 我穿圣诞服装很可爱

translation.en: I look very cute in Christmas outfits. [giggles]
translation.zh: 你可以画我 我穿圣诞服装很可爱

translation.en: I'll definitely win then. Absolutely. That's a great idea.
translation.zh:
那我一定能赢 肯定的 这是个好主意
你几天前就该告诉我的

translation.en: -You should've told me this days ago. -I have all the good ideas.
translation.zh:
肯定的 这是个好主意
你几天前就该告诉我的 -我妙点子可多了
-是的

translation.en: [man] Knock knock.
translation.zh: 敲敲门

translation.en: David.
translation.zh: 大卫

translation.en: You were supposed to call me when you got in so I could pick you up.
translation.zh:
你一落地就该给我打电话
我好去接你

translation.en: I just grabbed a rideshare. It was easier than bothering you.
translation.zh:
我叫了一辆顺风车
这比麻烦你方便多了

translation.en: -Ooh! -Good to see ya.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Having you here for Christmas is, like, the best thing ever.
translation.zh: 有你在这里过圣诞节是最棒的事

translation.en: It's a double win for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说是双赢

translation.en: I get to see your new place and spend the holidays with you.
translation.zh:
我可以看看你的新家
同时和你一起过节

translation.en: -Mm. -Bayside is a big change from New York. Yeah, and that's exactly how we like it.
translation.zh:
-湾岸这里跟纽约大不一样
-是啊 我们看中的就是这个

translation.en: Hey, I hope you're okay with this whole garage vibe.
translation.zh:
嘿 我希望你能接受
这种车库风格的房间

translation.en: -No. -You know, I hope this works.
translation.zh:
-哦
-希望这样能行得通

translation.en: It's different from what you're used to but--
translation.zh: 和你以前习惯住的地方不一样 但…

translation.en: Works for me. I started out in the garage.
translation.zh:
我没问题 我最开始就是住在车库里
我还有一幅画要完成

translation.en: One more picture to finish and then I'm yours until the next corporation calls.
translation.zh:
我没问题 我最开始就是住在车库里
我还有一幅画要完成 然后在下一家公司来电之前
我任你差遣

translation.en: Score. Oh, hey.
translation.zh: 太棒了 对了

translation.en: I actually kept my old sketching desk from our days in New York.
translation.zh:
实际上 我保留了
我们在纽约时使用的旧素描桌

translation.en: And don't worry. Your original masterpiece is still intact.
translation.zh: 不过你放心 你原来的杰作依然完好无损

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Look at that.
translation.zh: 看看啊

translation.en: A stone-age cave drawing.
translation.zh: 几百年前的手绘了

translation.en: Whoa! This is a Wyatt Graham original. How much do you think I could get for it?
translation.zh: 哇哦 这可是怀亚特格莱姆的真迹 这个我能卖出多少钱？

translation.en: My originals are computer-generated these days,
translation.zh: 近来我的作品都是电脑绘画

translation.en: so unless we can find a hotel lobby this will work in,
translation.zh: 除非我们能找到一个合适的酒店大堂

translation.en: I don't think anyone's going to be interested, but enough about me, come on.
translation.zh:
否则应该没人会感兴趣
我的事已经聊够了 来吧

translation.en: Yeah, not quite.
translation.zh: 不一定

translation.en: Cheryl is going to need a lot more,
translation.zh: 雪柔肯定还会问你好多事

translation.en: and she's definitely going to ask about Michelle.
translation.zh: 她肯定会问到米歇尔

translation.en: And I'm going to tell her what I tell everyone else.
translation.zh:
我会告诉她
我跟其他人说过的那些话

translation.en: She wanted to settle down. I wasn't ready.
translation.zh: 她想成家安定下来 我还没准备好

translation.en: Not ready to stop traveling?
translation.zh: 还没准备好放弃四处漂泊的生活？

translation.en: I love the places I get to go.
translation.zh: 我喜欢周游四方 我只是…

translation.en: I'm just… I'm not artistically satisfied.
translation.zh: 我在艺术上还有不满意的地方

translation.en: I used to use pencils to create my drawings
translation.zh: 我以前用铅笔创作

translation.en: and now everything is computer-generated.
translation.zh: 现在所有的作品都是用电脑

translation.en: There's no human element to the finished product anymore.
translation.zh: 成品不再有人情味

translation.en: I get it, and so…
translation.zh: 我明白 因此…

translation.en: I've gone ahead and done something. [chuckles] What did you do?
translation.zh:
-我自行其是做了一件事
-拜托 你做了什么？

translation.en: I have entered you in the City Christmas Art Festival.
translation.zh: 我给你报名了城市圣诞艺术节

translation.en: -Hmm. -So it's time to put up or get mad at me.
translation.zh:
现在你现在要么付诸行动
要么对我发火

translation.en: Or maybe… maybe thank you.
translation.zh: 或者也许 也许是要谢谢你

translation.en: Hey, what are friends for?
translation.zh: 嘿 这就是朋友嘛

translation.en: The contest is Christmas-themed.
translation.zh: 比赛以圣诞节为主题

translation.en: So I was thinking, hey, you know, you could just enter this,
translation.zh: 所以我在想 你可以直接提交这一幅

translation.en: and then you don't have to create anything new.
translation.zh: 不用再重新创作了

translation.en: Nah, no way. It's a lot to process, but I love a challenge.
translation.zh:
不 不行 要考虑的地方很多
但我喜欢挑战

translation.en: And, hey, it could be fun.
translation.zh: 而且这可能会很有趣

translation.en: [David] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll need supplies.
translation.zh: 我得弄到工具

translation.en: I got you covered on that. There's a shop downtown.
translation.zh: 我帮你搞定了 市中心有一家商店

translation.en: -Perfect. -Let's go get some food.
translation.zh:
-完美
-我们去吃点东西吧 来吧

translation.en: [David] I got this.
translation.zh: 我拿这个

translation.en: -Hey, welcome back. -I just came in to drop Ella off.
translation.zh:
嘿 欢迎回来 我来送艾拉
我忘记工作鞋了 我得回家一趟

translation.en: I forgot my work shoes so I need to go home.
translation.zh:
我来送艾拉
我忘记工作鞋了 我得回家一趟

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -It's okay. Hurry back.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-没关系 -好的
-快点回来

translation.en: -Hey, Patrick. -Charlotte, boy, am I glad to see you.
translation.zh:
-嘿 帕特里克
-夏洛特 老天 见到你真高兴

translation.en: -I got a question for you. -Sure. What's up?
translation.zh:
-我有个问题要问你
-没问题 怎么了？

translation.en: There's been a hiccup in the Christmas festival planning.
translation.zh: 圣诞节庆典的筹备工作遇到了麻烦

translation.en: Is there a chance that Charlie's Kitchen could come on as our official restaurant?
translation.zh:
查理厨房能不能担任
我们的官方餐厅？

translation.en: Really? What happened?
translation.zh: 真的吗？怎么了？

translation.en: I thought Home Cooking was doing it this year and every year.
translation.zh:
我以为今年和往年一样
还是家常餐厅负责此事

translation.en: Yeah, well, Brenda hurt her back, and she's out for at least two weeks.
translation.zh:
是的 布兰达的背部受伤了
至少有两周她都不能工作

translation.en: -Oh. -I need someone and thought of you first.
translation.zh:
我需要有人来救救我
先想到的就是你

translation.en: Well, thank you for that, but--
translation.zh: 谢谢你的好意 但是…

translation.en: Not all of the events need food. Just three of them.
translation.zh:
不是所有的活动都需要餐点
只有三个活动需要

translation.en: Just the opening holiday party, the Christmas Art Festival Showcase,
translation.zh: 节日开幕派对、圣诞艺术节橱窗展示

translation.en: and the Yuletide Gala.
translation.zh: 还有圣诞联欢晚会

translation.en: Um… Well, you know, I love the festival, but the opening's tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你知道我很喜欢圣诞节 但明天就要开幕了

translation.en: I would be grateful for whatever you put together, it doesn't have to be fancy.
translation.zh:
无论你做出什么餐点
我都会感激不尽 用不着很花哨 我只是…

translation.en: I just… I don't have anyone else I trust to handle this
translation.zh:
用不着很花哨 我只是… 我找不到其他可信任的人
临时接手此事

translation.en: on such late notice.
translation.zh:
我找不到其他可信任的人
临时接手此事

translation.en: Yes? I mean, I'm sure my mom would love the publicity for the restaurant.
translation.zh:
好的 我妈妈肯定愿意
借此机会宣传一下餐厅

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 太谢谢你了 你不知道这有多重要

translation.en: You have no idea how much this means. You are saving the day.
translation.zh: 太谢谢你了 你不知道这有多重要 你简直是我的救世主

translation.en: Is your mom in the back? Yeah, she is. Tell her I said yes?
translation.zh:
-你妈妈在后面吗？
-是的 告诉她我答应了

translation.en: Thanks, Charlotte.
translation.zh: 谢谢 夏洛特

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 喂 你在干什么？

translation.en: I'm fixing the picture. Can't have a messed-up Santa at Christmas.
translation.zh:
我在修补这幅画 -圣诞老人的脸可不能花了
-是吗？

translation.en: Oh, really?
translation.zh:
-圣诞老人的脸可不能花了
-是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, whoever drew this is pretty good too.
translation.zh: 是啊 这画的作者画功也不错

translation.en: -Pretty good? -Absolutely.
translation.zh:
-不错？
-当然

translation.en: Is there something that you'd do differently?
translation.zh: 换你画的话 会有什么不同吗？

translation.en: Maybe I would put a Christmas tree right here in the background.
translation.zh: 也许我会在背景这里画一棵圣诞树？

translation.en: Hmm. I'd prefer a sleigh.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢雪橇

translation.en: Yes, but the public would be expecting a sleigh.
translation.zh: 是啊 但是雪橇很老套

translation.en: Plus, I get to decorate a tree.
translation.zh:
-而且我还可以装饰这棵树
-你吗？

translation.en: My board, my decorations.
translation.zh: 我的画板 我来装饰

translation.en: I might let you draw a tree 'cause I can always erase it.
translation.zh:
我或许可以让你画一棵树
反正我也可以擦掉

translation.en: And you are? The pretty good artist.
translation.zh:
-请问你是哪位？
-那个画功不错的画家

translation.en: Oh, well, in that case, I'll just take the tree.
translation.zh: 那样的话 我只负责画树

translation.en: Okay, Rembrandt, but if you mess it up, you got to answer to the owner.
translation.zh:
好吧 大画家伦勃朗 但如果你搞砸了
店主会找你问责

translation.en: Which I'm guessing is probably you.
translation.zh: 我猜店主可能就是你

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Well, I'm willing to chance it.
translation.zh: 那我愿意碰碰运气

translation.en: Hey, artist at work.
translation.zh: 嘿 画家在工作呢

translation.en: My board.
translation.zh: 那可是我的黑板

translation.en: Okay. Your turn.
translation.zh: 好吧 轮到你了

translation.en: Artist at work.
translation.zh: 画家在工作呢

translation.en: Okay. You're better than pretty good.
translation.zh: 好吧 你可不止是“不错”

translation.en: -So are you. -Well, thank you.
translation.zh:
-你也是
-谢谢

translation.en: -And you are? -I'm Wyatt.
translation.zh:
-你是哪位？
-我叫怀亚特

translation.en: -Charlotte. -Your restaurant? Any good?
translation.zh: 我是夏洛特 你的餐厅…味道还不错吧？

translation.en: It is! I'm also the head chef. You're invited to try it.
translation.zh: 是的！我还是主厨 诚邀你进去尝尝

translation.en: Sounds good to me. I'd love to try.
translation.zh: 没问题 我愿意试试

translation.en: Right now, I'm just headed to the craft store, but…
translation.zh: 我现在要去工艺品店 但是

translation.en: this was fun.
translation.zh: 刚才挺好玩的

translation.en: -I'll be seeing you, Charlotte. -Hope so.
translation.zh:
-我们回头见 夏洛特
-希望如此

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh:
-圣诞快乐
-圣诞快乐

translation.en: Right, shoes.
translation.zh: 对了 鞋子

translation.en: One quick touch-up.
translation.zh: 飞快地画几笔

translation.en: -Hey, Ella. -[Ella] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 艾拉 嘿 你还回不回来了？

translation.en: Are you coming back anytime soon?
translation.zh: 嘿 你还回不回来了？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. I'll be right there. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好的 我马上过去 对不起

translation.en: It's really good to see you again. Happy holidays.
translation.zh: 很高兴再次见到你 节日快乐

translation.en: -You made the shoes? -Sorry, I got distracted.
translation.zh:
-你是自己现做了一双鞋吗？
-抱歉 我分心了

translation.en: [Ella] Distracted with painting?
translation.zh: 分心去画画了？

translation.en: Your mom wants to talk to us about some big news.
translation.zh: 你妈妈想告诉我们个重要消息

translation.en: -I already know all about it. -Am I being promoted?
translation.zh:
-我已经知道了
-是我要升职了吗？

translation.en: -Am I finally your boss now? -You already got a promotion.
translation.zh:
-我终于是你的上司了吗？
-你已经升过职了

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm impatient.
translation.zh:
-我不是等不及了嘛
-别太贪心

translation.en: Don't wish for too much because Mom's news is going to tax your cooking skills.
translation.zh:
-我不是等不及了嘛
-别太贪心 妈妈的消息
会给你的烹饪技巧带来考验

translation.en: Huh, yeah. Good, that's news I want to hear.
translation.zh: 很好 正是我想听的消息

translation.en: The art festival has last-minute food needs,
translation.zh: 艺术节提出了临时的餐饮需求

translation.en: and we have been asked to save the day.
translation.zh: 请求我们去救他们于水火

translation.en: -I thought-- -Brenda hurt her back.
translation.zh:
-我以为…
-布兰达的后背受伤了

translation.en: The Yuletide Gala will be here?
translation.zh: 圣诞联欢晚会要在这里举行？

translation.en: Yep, on the 22nd. Plus, two more events.
translation.zh: 是的 在22号 还有其他两场活动

translation.en: The Gala means out-of-town reporters, articles, blogs.
translation.zh:
联欢晚会代表着外地的记者
报道和博客

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -People all over the country see them.
translation.zh: 全国人民都会看到

translation.en: -This could put us on a bigger map. -I know it could be nice.
translation.zh:
-这能帮我们提高知名度
-应该会很好

translation.en: We have to hit the ground running. The opening party is tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们要全力以赴了 明天是开幕派对

translation.en: So we'll meet here in the morning. Early.
translation.zh: 我们明天早上在这里集合 要早点

translation.en: And for now, let's get on that dinner rush. Come on.
translation.zh: 现在我们先来应对晚餐高峰期 来吧

translation.en: I couldn't sleep. I saw the light on.
translation.zh: 我睡不着 我看到灯还是亮的

translation.en: Why are you still up?
translation.zh: 你怎么还没睡？

translation.en: I'm just unwinding, fooling around.
translation.zh: 我只是在放松心情 随便干点什么

translation.en: Don't stay up all night.
translation.zh: 别熬一整晚

translation.en: I am worried about tomorrow. I need you to be fresh.
translation.zh:
我担心明天的事
我需要你有清醒的头脑

translation.en: I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't mean to push,
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是想咄咄逼人

translation.en: but could this… project wait until tomorrow?
translation.zh: 但你能等到明天再画吗？

translation.en: -Sure-- -Or after the festival?
translation.zh:
-当然…
-或是等到节后？

translation.en: -Oh, absolutely. -That would be better.
translation.zh: 完全没问题 那样就更好了 好的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 那样就更好了 好的

translation.en: Thank you. I'm counting on you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我就指望你了

translation.en: Of course. You can always count on me.
translation.zh: 当然了 你永远可以指望我

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: -What you got there? -Free Christmas decorations.
translation.zh:
你拿的是什么？ 免费的圣诞装饰
“免费”的东西谁能错过？

translation.en: Who's going to argue with free?
translation.zh:
免费的圣诞装饰
“免费”的东西谁能错过？

translation.en: You know, people around here always go all out for the holidays.
translation.zh: 这里的人对节日非常认真

translation.en: Yeah, I noticed.
translation.zh: 是的 我注意到了

translation.en: And what's… what's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh, it's just something by the box, I think someone was just throwing it out.
translation.zh: 就放在盒子旁边 看起来像是被人扔掉了

translation.en: [Wyatt] No, this is half-finished.
translation.zh: 不 这幅画只完成了一半

translation.en: Just toss it then.
translation.zh: 那扔掉就行了

translation.en: -I don't think so. -You want to keep it?
translation.zh:
不行 -你要留着吗？
-是的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你要留着吗？
-是的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Are you really okay with all this extra work?
translation.zh: 你加班真的没问题吗？

translation.en: Why wouldn't I be?
translation.zh: 为什么会有问题？

translation.en: I figured both work and getting your painting done for the contest would be too much.
translation.zh:
你又要工作 又要为比赛准备绘画
我担心你应付不来

translation.en: -How are you going to do both now? -Don't worry about me.
translation.zh:
-你要怎样兼顾两者？
-不用担心我

translation.en: The restaurant has my complete attention. You submitted it already?
translation.zh:
-我要把精力都放在餐厅上
-你已经提交作品了？

translation.en: Nope, I threw it away.
translation.zh: 没有 我把作品扔掉了

translation.en: -You what? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You need me. My mom needs me. Everyone needs me.
translation.zh: 你需要我 我妈妈需要我 大家都需要我

translation.en: -It's for the best. -No, it's not. Come on.
translation.zh:
-这样最好
-不是的 拜托

translation.en: Look, as much as I love painting,
translation.zh: 听着 虽然我很爱画画

translation.en: last night, I saw how overwhelmed my mom was with all of this.
translation.zh:
昨晚我看到
我妈妈真的有点不堪重负

translation.en: If she can't sleep, then it's serious. So work over hobbies, right?
translation.zh:
如果她都睡不着觉 那说明很严重
工作比爱好重要 对吧？

translation.en: I don't want you to do something you're going to regret.
translation.zh: 我不想让你做出自己会后悔的事

translation.en: No, it's… it's for the best.
translation.zh: 不会 这样最好了

translation.en: Well, look who it is.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这是谁啊

translation.en: Oh, hi. This is a nice surprise.
translation.zh: 你好 这真是个惊喜

translation.en: -Are you offering caricatures? -No.
translation.zh:
-你是画漫画的吗？
-不是

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Don't mind if I do.
translation.zh: 那我就不客气了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
translation.zh: 酒很不错

translation.en: You know what else is really good? That painting.
translation.zh: 你知道还有什么很不错吗？那幅画

translation.en: You okay? You look like you've seen the ghost of Christmas past.
translation.zh:
你没事吧？你看起来就像是
看到了圣诞节幽灵

translation.en: -Worse. -What happened?
translation.zh:
-比那更糟
-怎么了？

translation.en: Nothing. I'm okay. I just-- I hallucinated.
translation.zh: 没什么 我没事 我就是眼花了

translation.en: I mean, like, I hope I hallucinated.
translation.zh: 我希望是自己眼花了

translation.en: Oh, I get it.
translation.zh: 我懂了

translation.en: Seeing everyone else's artwork out there isn't easy.
translation.zh: 看到别人的画作让你很难受

translation.en: Next year is going to be your year, okay?
translation.zh: 明年你就能参加了 好吧？

translation.en: We should get back to serving food.
translation.zh: 我们应该回去上菜了

translation.en: -Would you like some more wine? -Oh, no, thanks.
translation.zh: 要不要再来点酒？ 不了 谢谢

translation.en: Are you okay? Did I do something to upset you? You just disappeared.
translation.zh:
你没事吧？我做了让你难过的事吗？
你一言不发就走了

translation.en: You're Wyatt… Graham, the architectural artist?
translation.zh: 你是怀亚特格莱姆 那个建筑艺术家？

translation.en: -You've heard of me? -I have a coffee table book of your work.
translation.zh: 你听说过我？ 我有一咖啡桌的书 都是你的作品

translation.en: You must like hotel lobbies.
translation.zh: 你一定很喜欢酒店大堂

translation.en: I like art.
translation.zh: 我喜欢艺术

translation.en: So do I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: You know, I find it really strange
translation.zh: 我觉得很奇怪

translation.en: that the only art with your name on it isn't even yours.
translation.zh:
这里唯一印有你名字的画作
竟然不是你的作品

translation.en: I'm not trying to steal anyone's thunder. I'm going to submit my own work.
translation.zh:
我不是要剽窃别人的作品
我还要提交自己的作品

translation.en: I just… I love what there is of this.
translation.zh: 我只是…喜欢这幅画的感觉

translation.en: You don't happen to know who the artist is, do you?
translation.zh: 你不会正巧认识这位画家吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I do. And you should take it down.
translation.zh: 我确实认识 你应该把这幅画拿下来

translation.en: If the artist wants to tell me in person, I'd be happy to.
translation.zh:
如果那位画家亲自和我这么说
我很乐意从命

translation.en: Let's just say the artist threw it away for a reason.
translation.zh:
这么说吧 那位画家扔掉这幅画
是有原因的

translation.en: I can't imagine what would make an artist throw out a work like this.
translation.zh:
我无法想象一位画家
能把这样一幅作品丢掉的原因

translation.en: I can.
translation.zh: 我可以

translation.en: Even half finished, there's nothing like it in here.
translation.zh:
就算还没完成 这幅画也极为独特
所有人都在谈论它

translation.en: Everyone's talking about it.
translation.zh:
这幅画也极为独特
所有人都在谈论它

translation.en: Well, it would be better if they were talking about the food.
translation.zh: 如果他们谈论的是食物就更好了

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Charlotte, we are making a great impression up there.
translation.zh:
夏洛特 我们给大家
留下了深刻的印象

translation.en: -Everyone seems to love the food. -All thanks to your and Ella's work.
translation.zh: 食物获得了大家的一致好评 多亏了你和艾拉的努力

translation.en: Well, it's the job, Mom. It's… my only focus right now.
translation.zh:
这是我的工作 妈妈 -是我现在唯一的关注点
-所以你才是最棒的

translation.en: That's why you're the best.
translation.zh:
-是我现在唯一的关注点
-所以你才是最棒的

translation.en: Good night. Thanks so much for coming.
translation.zh: 晚安 非常感谢您的到来

translation.en: Well, I think we pulled it off.
translation.zh: 看来我们成功了

translation.en: And I'd say the food was pretty perfect.
translation.zh:
-我觉得食物很完美
-谢谢夸奖

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -I got to say, you look amazing.
translation.zh:
-我觉得食物很完美
-谢谢夸奖 我得说 你看起来很动人

translation.en: Oh, stop it.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: Well, it has been a while since I've been this dressed up.
translation.zh: 我已经很久没穿得这么正式了

translation.en: Oh, well, then I need to host a few more of these.
translation.zh: 那我得再多举办几场活动

translation.en: I was wondering, are you coming to the Color Me Christmas event tomorrow?
translation.zh:
我想知道
你明天会参加七彩圣诞活动吗？

translation.en: I wasn't planning on it.
translation.zh: 我没这个打算

translation.en: Charlotte's the artist, I'm the numbers gal.
translation.zh: 夏洛特是画家 我的专长是数字

translation.en: Oh, that's too bad.
translation.zh: 太可惜了

translation.en: Thought you might use it as another opportunity to promote your restaurant.
translation.zh: 你可以利用这个机会宣传餐厅

translation.en: Lots of out-of-towners never heard of Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.zh:
很多没听说过查理厨房的外地人
都会出席

translation.en: You've got a point.
translation.zh: 你的话有道理

translation.en: -Just think about it. -I'm thinking.
translation.zh: 考虑一下 我正在考虑

translation.en: Well, I hope I see you tomorrow, Molly. Good night.
translation.zh: 莫莉 我希望明天能够见到你 晚安

translation.en: What was that about?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: He wants me to go to Color Me Christmas.
translation.zh:
-他想让我去参加七彩圣诞活动
-是吗？

translation.en: Really? You should definitely go.
translation.zh:
-他想让我去参加七彩圣诞活动
-是吗？ 你绝对要去

translation.en: Well, I would be promoting the restaurant if I brought some of our hot spice cider.
translation.zh:
如果我带上一些热辣苹果酒
就可以为餐厅做一波宣传

translation.en: That works. Business and some pleasure.
translation.zh: 没问题 生意和玩乐两手抓

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Just business.
translation.zh: 只是生意而已

translation.en: If you say so.
translation.zh: 如果你非要这么说

translation.en: Okay, Wyatt.
translation.zh: 好吧 怀亚特

translation.en: What do we draw?
translation.zh: 我们画什么呢？

translation.en: -Hi. -Sorry, we don't open for another… hour.
translation.zh: 你好 抱歉 我们一小时后才…开门

translation.en: I was just taking a walk and I thought, "olive branch."
translation.zh:
我只是在闲逛
然后想到了“伸出橄榄枝”

translation.en: Last night I gave you the wrong impression about why I hung the painting up.
translation.zh:
昨晚我好像让你误会了
我挂上那幅画的初衷

translation.en: I'm listening.
translation.zh: 我听着呢

translation.en: I wasn't trying to take credit away from the artist.
translation.zh: 我不是想剽窃那位画家的作品

translation.en: I was just trying to spotlight the art that spoke to me.
translation.zh: 我只是想让大家看到触动我的作品

translation.en: Well, I love that it spoke to you,
translation.zh:
我很开心那幅画触动了你
但如果画家本人并不想让其他人

translation.en: but what if the artist isn't interested in having the art seen?
translation.zh:
我很开心那幅画触动了你
但如果画家本人并不想让其他人 看到这幅画呢？

translation.en: That's a fair question, but why wouldn't they be?
translation.zh: 这个问题很有道理 但为什么呢？

translation.en: It's complicated.
translation.zh: 原因很复杂

translation.en: I hear the next event is some public painting thing today.
translation.zh: 我听说下一场活动是今天的公共绘画

translation.en: You want to come with me?
translation.zh: 你想跟我一起去吗？我不太擅长手绘

translation.en: I'm not much of a painter and maybe you can give me some pointers.
translation.zh: 你想跟我一起去吗？我不太擅长手绘 也许你可以给我一些建议

translation.en: I'll think about it.
translation.zh: 我会考虑一下

translation.en: Can't ask for more than that.
translation.zh: 你这么说我就心满意足了

translation.en: I'll head over early and save you a seat just in case.
translation.zh: 我会早点过去 给你占个位子 以防万一

translation.en: The mystery man you were hanging around with last night has followed you here?
translation.zh:
昨晚在开幕庆典上
跟你聊天的那个神秘人 跟着你到这里来了？

translation.en: His name is Wyatt. He's a well-known artist.
translation.zh: 他叫怀亚特 是个知名画家

translation.en: He seems like a… interesting guy, but, um…
translation.zh: 他看起来是个有意思的家伙 但是…

translation.en: But what?
translation.zh: 但是什么？

translation.en: But we have unfinished business.
translation.zh: 我们之间还有旧账没有算清

translation.en: Oh, like your unfinished painting hanging at the gallery?
translation.zh:
是因为画廊里展出的
你那件未完成的作品吗？

translation.en: I'd know your style anywhere.
translation.zh: 我一看就知道是你的画风

translation.en: Well, only you, and now Wyatt, know that.
translation.zh:
好吧 现在只有你和怀亚特
知道这件事

translation.en: I should have known you wouldn't throw it out.
translation.zh: 我就知道你不会直接扔掉那幅画

translation.en: But I did. I threw it in the trash.
translation.zh:
但我确实扔掉了
我扔到垃圾箱那里了

translation.en: I don't even know how he got his hands on it.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他是怎么拿到手的

translation.en: I'm failing to see the problem. Based on what I heard, you could win.
translation.zh:
我没觉得有什么问题啊
就我听到的评价 你可能会拿第一

translation.en: It's a half-finished painting,
translation.zh: 那幅画都没完成

translation.en: nothing that I'd want anyone seeing in its current form.
translation.zh: 我不想让任何人看到它现在的样子

translation.en: With the restaurant responsibilities, I can't finish it if I wanted to.
translation.zh:
因为餐厅的重任
即使我想完成都不可能

translation.en: I just-- I'm going to take it down.
translation.zh: 我真的…我要去把它拿下来 真的

translation.en: -I am. -You had a chance to last night.
translation.zh: 我真的…我要去把它拿下来 真的 你昨晚有机会这么做

translation.en: Well, people were talking, and I, you know, like, I didn't want to…
translation.zh: 大家都在聊天 我…我不想…

translation.en: Take it down.
translation.zh: 把它拿下来

translation.en: Well, I do now.
translation.zh: 我现在想了

translation.en: Well, I think you should accept the nice artist man's invitation today,
translation.zh:
我觉得你今天应该接受
那位男画家的邀请

translation.en: even if it is to tell him you want your painting back.
translation.zh:
即便只是为了告诉他
你要把自己的作品拿回来

translation.en: Can I at least know more about him?
translation.zh: 至少让我再了解一下他吧？

translation.en: There's… there's nothing to say.
translation.zh: 没什么好说的

translation.en: Tell me you don't want to know more about him.
translation.zh: 告诉我 你确实不想多了解他

translation.en: I already know about him.
translation.zh: 我早就了解他了

translation.en: Well, I mean, I know what he does for a living. Like, I mean, I know his career.
translation.zh:
我知道他是做什么的
我知道他的整个职业生涯

translation.en: I don't know him personally, but it's the same…
translation.zh:
我不知道他是什么样的人
但这没什么区别

translation.en: You must want to know more because you're talking in circles.
translation.zh:
你肯定还想多了解他
因为你在说车轱辘话

translation.en: Okay, I'll go if it'll make you happy,
translation.zh:
好吧 如果这能让你开心的话
我去就是了

translation.en: but only to tell him that I'm taking the painting down.
translation.zh:
但只是为了告诉他
我要把那幅画拿下来

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Right. Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错 是啊

translation.en: Just for that reason.
translation.zh: 就因为这个原因

translation.en: -Yep. -Just for that.
translation.zh: 就为了这个

translation.en: Not bad.
translation.zh: 还不错

translation.en: I thought I heard you coming in.
translation.zh: 我就听着像是你回来了

translation.en: What are you doing home and dressed like that?
translation.zh: 你在家里做什么呢？穿成这样？

translation.en: Ella has the kitchen covered today so I was going to Color Me Christmas.
translation.zh:
艾拉今天负责厨房的事
所以我想去参加七彩圣诞活动

translation.en: Oh, you are such a good daughter.
translation.zh: 你真是个好女儿

translation.en: I could use a second set of hands with the spice cider.
translation.zh: 正好再多双手帮我拿苹果酒

translation.en: Oh, I'm happy to help.
translation.zh: 我很乐意帮忙

translation.en: I'll take care of the cider.
translation.zh: 我来拿苹果酒

translation.en: You know, if you are looking this good, I should step up my game too.
translation.zh: 如果你看起来这么漂亮 我也应该加把劲

translation.en: I'm sure Patrick would like that.
translation.zh: 帕特里克肯定会喜欢的

translation.en: He never crossed my mind.
translation.zh: 我根本没想到他

translation.en: Right, right. Oh, you just…
translation.zh:
-好吧
-你真是…

translation.en: Charlie's Kitchen cider?
translation.zh: 尝尝查理厨房苹果酒？

translation.en: Enjoy.
translation.zh: 请慢用

translation.en: So my invitation was just too irresistible to pass up.
translation.zh: 我的邀请令人无法抵挡

translation.en: You got lucky, I was working.
translation.zh: 算你走运 我刚是在工作

translation.en: -It's a nice place to work. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这是个工作的好地方

translation.en: I love the boats.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那些船

translation.en: Yeah, it's an outdoor boat museum. They're part of the town's history.
translation.zh:
这是个户外船舶博物馆
它们是小镇历史的一部分

translation.en: You know, your station here looks like it's self-sufficient.
translation.zh: 你的摊位看起来可以自行运转

translation.en: Why not come join me at an easel?
translation.zh: 为何不跟我一起去画架那边看看？

translation.en: I should really stay here.
translation.zh: 我应该待在这里

translation.en: People can figure out how to fill their own cups.
translation.zh: 人们能弄明白要如何续杯

translation.en: -Okay, wise guy. Let's go. -All right.
translation.zh:
-好吧 聪明人 走吧
-好的

translation.en: I warn you, though, using a brush is way different than using a pencil.
translation.zh:
我要警告你
用笔刷和用铅笔完全不一样

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Ready for your lesson? -I am.
translation.zh:
-准备好上课了吗？
-是的

translation.en: Wait, it's turning into, like, a watercolor.
translation.zh: 等一下 它变成了水彩画

translation.en: -Yeah, that should work. -All right.
translation.zh:
-对 那样应该可以
-对

translation.en: So get some green.
translation.zh: 好的 上点绿色

translation.en: [Wyatt] Green, green.
translation.zh: 绿色

translation.en: -All right. -No.
translation.zh: 好的 不对

translation.en: You hold it like this.
translation.zh: 你要这样握着

translation.en: -Almost like a pencil. -Kind of.
translation.zh:
-好的
-和握铅笔差不多 -算是吧
-好的

translation.en: -All right. -Just let the brush do the work, okay?
translation.zh: 让笔刷自然地画下来 好吗？

translation.en: -Hold on. -How's that?
translation.zh:
-等一下
-怎么样？

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Here, just let me… -Sure.
translation.zh:
-来 让我…
-好的

translation.en: Close your eyes.
translation.zh: 闭上眼睛

translation.en: Just feel it.
translation.zh: 用心去感受

translation.en: Yeah! Look, you can do it.
translation.zh: 好的！你看 你能行

translation.en: Hey, you made it.
translation.zh: 嘿 你来了

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: They really like our cider.
translation.zh: 大家真的很喜欢我们的苹果酒

translation.en: Yeah, we've had a lot of folks in and out today.
translation.zh: 今天这里人流量很大

translation.en: I saw a lot of people over here so that's good.
translation.zh: 我看到很多人来这边 这是好事

translation.en: Well, thank you for inviting us to do this.
translation.zh: 感谢你邀请我们参加这个活动

translation.en: You should go look at what Charlotte is painting.
translation.zh: 你应该去看看夏洛特的画

translation.en: She has a talent.
translation.zh: 她很有天赋

translation.en: She likes to paint.
translation.zh: 她喜欢画画

translation.en: It's a good release for her, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜这对她来说是很好的放松

translation.en: It's been fun spending this holiday time with you.
translation.zh: 和你一起度过节日 真是太好了

translation.en: I'd have to agree.
translation.zh: 我必须同意

translation.en: So, what big city do you live in? Well, what makes you think I'm from a big city?
translation.zh:
-你住在哪个大城市？
-你为什么觉得我来自大城市？

translation.en: -Really? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 还装？

translation.en: All right, New York,
translation.zh: 好吧 纽约

translation.en: but I travel so much for each gig, I can barely say I live there.
translation.zh:
但我为了工作经常四处旅行
所以不能说住在这里

translation.en: And you came to Bayside, why?
translation.zh: 你为什么来湾岸？

translation.en: To visit my good friend, David.
translation.zh: 来看我的好朋友 大卫

translation.en: He's the one who encouraged me to enter the art contest.
translation.zh: 是他鼓励我参加这次艺术比赛的

translation.en: You mean enter someone else into the art contest?
translation.zh: 你是说让别人去参加艺术比赛吧？

translation.en: I'm going to enter.
translation.zh: 我会参赛的

translation.en: I just haven't figured out what I want to draw yet.
translation.zh: 我只是还没想好要画什么

translation.en: Well, Bayside has some beautiful buildings.
translation.zh: 湾岸这里有不少漂亮的建筑

translation.en: I'm tired of architectural drawing.
translation.zh: 我不想再画建筑了

translation.en: Well, I like them. They're so precise, so…
translation.zh:
我喜欢建筑画
它们都如此精准 如此…

translation.en: Dry? Unemotional?
translation.zh: 干巴巴的？没有感情？

translation.en: -Do they move you? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-它们会触动你吗？
-会的

translation.en: I love them.
translation.zh: 我喜爱建筑画

translation.en: Well, I… I always thought they were cold.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得那种画冷冰冰的

translation.en: I mean, I want to bring warmth and life to my work.
translation.zh: 我想让自己的作品具有暖意和生命

translation.en: Like your work.
translation.zh: 就像你的作品一样

translation.en: Even half painted, your work shows so much more than mine.
translation.zh:
就算只画了一半
你的作品还是比我的更富有内涵

translation.en: No, but thank you.
translation.zh: 不是这样的 但是谢谢你

translation.en: Believe me, I know where you're coming from, though.
translation.zh: 不过我知道你为什么会这么想

translation.en: So many people have been dictating what I create for them.
translation.zh: 我的创作一直都是听从他人的指令

translation.en: I just-- I want to create something for myself.
translation.zh:
我只是…我想创作一些
属于自己的东西

translation.en: Well, there's nowhere more inspirational than Bayside at Christmas.
translation.zh:
没有什么地方比圣诞节期间的湾岸
更能启发人心了

translation.en: I'll be first in line to see what you submit.
translation.zh: 我一定要第一个看看你要提交的作品

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Okay. Well, what about you?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你呢？

translation.en: You are clearly a talented artist. Why are you working as a chef?
translation.zh:
你显然是个很有才华的画家
为什么要当主厨？

translation.en: Sometimes being there for your family is what's most important.
translation.zh:
有时候
做好家人的后盾才是最重要的

translation.en: Well, if only someone would understand the value of chasing your dreams.
translation.zh:
如果有人能理解
追逐梦想的价值就好了

translation.en: You're dreaming if you think you're gonna finish that by dark.
translation.zh:
我觉得你想在天黑之前完成这幅画
就是做梦 -多画画 少说话
-好的

translation.en: -More painting, less talking. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-多画画 少说话
-好的

translation.en: Charlotte, that is so pretty.
translation.zh: 夏洛特 你画得太漂亮了

translation.en: [Charlotte] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Okay. Be honest. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 一定要说实话 好吧

translation.en: Uh… It's good.
translation.zh: 还可以

translation.en: Ah. You know, tomorrow's festival event is Kringle's Krafts in the art gallery.
translation.zh:
明天的节日活动是艺术画廊的
圣诞老人才艺展

translation.en: You could do a demonstration with pencil.
translation.zh: 你可以用铅笔做一次示范

translation.en: You know, try out some ideas on the people there?
translation.zh: 看看人们对你的创意有何反应

translation.en: I bet you they would love to see you work.
translation.zh: 他们肯定会喜欢你的作品

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: I haven't drawn with a pencil in a while.
translation.zh:
-我好久没用铅笔画画了
-你可以的

translation.en: You could do it. And Patrick would love it.
translation.zh:
-我好久没用铅笔画画了
-你可以的 帕特里克肯定会喜欢

translation.en: Would you come?
translation.zh: 你会来吗？

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I just might, after work.
translation.zh: 我有可能去 下班之后

translation.en: I'm holding you to that.
translation.zh: 你可要说话算话

translation.en: You know, I think I'm gonna go burn this now.
translation.zh:
-我现在要烧掉这幅画
-别啊！

translation.en: -No! -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我现在要烧掉这幅画
-别啊！ 好吧

translation.en: -See you at Kringle's Krafts tomorrow? -Tomorrow. Bye.
translation.zh:
-我们圣诞老人才艺展上见？
-明天见 再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: He looks nice. Wyatt?
translation.zh:
-他看起来不错
-怀亚特？

translation.en: Oh, he has a name?
translation.zh: 他有名字啊

translation.en: Yeah, he knows mine too.
translation.zh: 是啊 他也知道我的名字

translation.en: That's a good start.
translation.zh: 这是个不错的开始

translation.en: I am so glad you're getting back out there.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你又愿意谈恋爱了

translation.en: That is very nice. Very nice.
translation.zh: 太漂亮了 非常好

translation.en: -Hey, man. -[Wyatt] Hey.
translation.zh:
-嘿 老兄
-嘿

translation.en: I thought I'd add a little more Christmas cheer in here
translation.zh: 我想着应该给这里添加一些圣诞氛围

translation.en: to help get those creative juices flowing.
translation.zh: 帮助你灵思泉涌

translation.en: Love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Did you fish another painting out of the trash? No, this one's all mine.
translation.zh:
-又从垃圾里找到一幅画？
-不 这是我画的

translation.en: But you were blindfolded, right?
translation.zh: 你是蒙着眼睛画的吗？

translation.en: I had my eyes closed for part of it, but I'm not a painter.
translation.zh:
有一阵子我闭上了眼睛
但是我真的不会画水彩

translation.en: Let's see that. Okay.
translation.zh:
-让我看看
-好的

translation.en: Then why did you paint this?
translation.zh: 那你为什么画这个？

translation.en: Have you and Cheryl already had dinner?
translation.zh: 你和雪柔吃过饭了吗？

translation.en: I was thinking about getting takeout from Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.zh: 我在想从查理厨房买点吃的回来

translation.en: -It's good food. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 那家的菜很好吃 是的 不要告诉其他人 这家店的主厨

translation.en: And between you and me,
translation.zh: 是的 不要告诉其他人 这家店的主厨

translation.en: the chef there turned out to be the creator of that painting you found.
translation.zh: 是的 不要告诉其他人 这家店的主厨 就是你捡回来的那副画的作者

translation.en: Okay, I like where this is going.
translation.zh: 好吧 我喜欢这事的发展势头

translation.en: -So, chef, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-所以 是个主厨？
-是的

translation.en: You going there for the food or you're going to see her?
translation.zh: 你想去那里吃东西 还是想去见她？

translation.en: Both.
translation.zh: 两者都有

translation.en: -[Wyatt] Hello. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-你好
-嗨

translation.en: Is it too late to place an order before closing?
translation.zh:
马上要打烊了
现在下单会不会有点晚？

translation.en: Of course not, but we need to talk. Have a seat.
translation.zh: 当然不会 但我们需要谈谈 坐吧

translation.en: I'm sorry. Have we met?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们见过面吗？

translation.en: No. No, I'm Ella.
translation.zh: 没有 我是艾拉

translation.en: I'm Charlotte's best friend,
translation.zh:
我是夏洛特最好的朋友
她现在不在这里

translation.en: and she's not here right now, which is good for us.
translation.zh:
我是夏洛特最好的朋友
她现在不在这里 这对我们来说是件好事

translation.en: Look, I don't know how you ended up with Charlotte's painting,
translation.zh:
我不知道你是怎么拿到
夏洛特那幅画作的

translation.en: but you clearly thought it was something special
translation.zh: 但你显然认为 那幅画很特别

translation.en: if you submitted it to the festival. -It is. She's a rare talent. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
-因为你把它提交到比赛上了
-的确 她是一位罕见的人才

translation.en: And she finally decided to enter the contest this year
translation.zh: 她今年终于决定参赛了

translation.en: until you cut her off at the knees.
translation.zh: 结果你把她拦腰挡住

translation.en: I didn't know that, but she also threw the painting out.
translation.zh: 这个我不知道 但她把那幅画扔掉了

translation.en: Well… there is that. But I was going to talk her back into entering and…
translation.zh: 确实 但我本来要劝说她重新参赛

translation.en: that's going to be harder to do with that half-finished painting hanging there.
translation.zh: 现在这么做就更难了 因为那幅未完成的画作就挂在那里

translation.en: Hmm. What do you suggest?
translation.zh: 你有什么建议？

translation.en: Let her take it down if that's what she wants to do.
translation.zh: 如果她想的话 就让她把画拿下来吧

translation.en: You know, I can do with some more friends like you.
translation.zh: 我需要更多像你这样的朋友

translation.en: I'm glad you understand.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你能理解 我爱夏洛特

translation.en: -I love Charlotte. -I like her too.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你能理解 我爱夏洛特 我也喜欢她

translation.en: Thought so.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: Now, will that be dine-in or takeout?
translation.zh: 你是要在店里吃 还是外带？

translation.en: Takeout?
translation.zh: 外带？

translation.en: Takeout.
translation.zh: 外带吧

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: So, I was thinking about the Gala.
translation.zh: 我在想这周末晚会的事

translation.en: We really need to shine, you know, bring our A-game.
translation.zh:
我们真的需要大放异彩
拿出我们的看家本领

translation.en: So I thought Christmas: something new, something different.
translation.zh: 所以我认为圣诞节的菜品要有新意 要与众不同 比如胡桃南瓜烩饭

translation.en: Butternut squash risotto. Hm?
translation.zh: 要与众不同 比如胡桃南瓜烩饭

translation.en: Sure you want to do something new instead of what we know our customers love?
translation.zh:
你确定要做新菜品
而不是顾客爱吃的菜吗？

translation.en: Hundred percent.
translation.zh: 百分之百确定

translation.en: -Honey? -Hmm?
translation.zh: 亲爱的？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: You know, it's just a lot of things.
translation.zh: 就是事情太多了

translation.en: My responsibilities here, I mean, which is my priority.
translation.zh: 我对这里的责任 这是我的重中之重

translation.en: I'm also enjoying the company of a man who's about to leave town.
translation.zh:
我也很享受一个即将离开这里的男人
带给我的陪伴

translation.en: I have conflicted feelings about that.
translation.zh: 我对此内心很矛盾

translation.en: And I just want to express myself through my paintings.
translation.zh: 我只想通过我的画来表达自己的感情

translation.en: I'm just feeling…
translation.zh: 我就是觉得…

translation.en: Overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 不堪重负

translation.en: You don't think I can manage?
translation.zh: 你觉得我办不到吗？

translation.en: I don't think anyone could handle this.
translation.zh: 我觉得没人能应付好这些事

translation.en: It's Christmas season, the restaurant is picking up, the festival…
translation.zh:
现在是圣诞季 餐厅的经营状况
越来越好 还有节日庆典…

translation.en: And you need to go see that man again before he leaves.
translation.zh:
而且你需要在他离开前
再和他见见面

translation.en: As far as your painting goes,
translation.zh: 至于说你的画 等这一切都结束后

translation.en: well, when this is all over, I'm sure you can fit it in.
translation.zh: 至于说你的画 等这一切都结束后 我相信你还能捡起来

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, maybe I can.
translation.zh: 是的 也许我可以

translation.en: Okay. Now, I want to taste that risotto.
translation.zh: 好的 现在我想尝尝那个烩饭

translation.en: Yeah, not this one 'cause it burned while we were talking.
translation.zh:
这次不行 因为我们聊天的时候
饭已经糊了

translation.en: Oh, okay, okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay, I'm just going to go.
translation.zh: 好吧 我先走了

translation.en: Hi. I'm glad you're here.
translation.zh: 你好 我很高兴你来了

translation.en: I'm so sorry I missed the show. We had a later-than-usual lunch service.
translation.zh: 对不起 我错过了表演 今天的午餐服务结束得比较晚

translation.en: -I like it. -[Wyatt] Yep.
translation.zh:
我喜欢这幅画 -是吧 我给你留了最后一步
-给我吗？

translation.en: -I saved the last bit just for you. -Me?
translation.zh:
-是吧 我给你留了最后一步
-给我吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You showed me brush technique.
translation.zh: 你给我演示过笔刷的技巧

translation.en: The least I can do is show you a little pencil technique.
translation.zh: 至少我可以给你演示下铅笔的技巧 好的 我具体要画什么？

translation.en: Okay, what am I doing exactly?
translation.zh: 好的 我具体要画什么？

translation.en: Well, Santa wouldn't be complete without his belt.
translation.zh: 没有腰带的圣诞老人并不完整

translation.en: All you have to do is darken the lines.
translation.zh: 你只需加深线条

translation.en: It's great. Just close your eyes and feel it.
translation.zh: 很好 闭上眼睛感受一下

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I have to admit, using a pencil is different than a paintbrush.
translation.zh:
我不得不承认
用铅笔的感觉和笔刷不一样

translation.en: Feels great to draw again.
translation.zh: 再次手绘的感觉真棒

translation.en: Um… Can I-- Can I ask you a favor?
translation.zh: 我能请你帮个忙吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: I've been putting together samples for my submission piece
translation.zh: 我一直在整理提交作品的投稿样例

translation.en: and was hoping you could look at them.
translation.zh: 希望你能看看它们

translation.en: I could really use an honest opinion.
translation.zh: 我需要一个诚实的意见

translation.en: I'd love to.
translation.zh:
-我很乐意
-真的吗？

translation.en: Th-That's great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: -Well, let's go do that. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-哇哦 我们去看看吧
-好的

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: This is my workspace while I'm here.
translation.zh: 这是我在这里停留期间的工作间

translation.en: Oh, hey. I thought I saw you come in.
translation.zh: 嘿 我就想着看到你们进来了

translation.en: -You must be David? -Yes.
translation.zh: 你肯定是大卫吧？

translation.en: -I'm Charlotte. -Nice to meet you…
translation.zh:
-是的
-我是夏洛特 很高兴认识你

translation.en: You're the chef from Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.zh: 你是查理厨房的主厨

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I love your grilled shrimp. It is the best.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你们的烤虾 最好吃了

translation.en: -Well, thanks. -Yeah, and thank you, by the way.
translation.zh: 谢谢 顺便要谢谢你

translation.en: I hear that you're the reason that this guy has gotten into drawing again.
translation.zh: 我听说你是这个人又开始手绘的原因

translation.en: I just suggested it. He did the rest.
translation.zh:
我只是提出建议而已
剩下的都是他自己的功劳

translation.en: Well, I got to head to the store, so it was very nice meeting you.
translation.zh: 我要去商店了 所以…很高兴认识你

translation.en: See you later, buddy.
translation.zh: 回头见 兄弟

translation.en: He's probably my oldest friend.
translation.zh: 他应该是跟我交情最久的朋友

translation.en: Keeps me grounded. Just moved here, actually.
translation.zh:
让我一直脚踏实地
他其实刚刚才搬到这里

translation.en: Well, he'll be here awhile then. People who move here don't leave.
translation.zh:
那他会在这里待一阵子了
搬来这里的人不会再离开

translation.en: Good to know.
translation.zh: 很高兴知道这点

translation.en: I just started drawing things that sparked my interest.
translation.zh:
我最开始时画的都是
一些能引发我兴趣的东西

translation.en: What do they have in common?
translation.zh: 它们有什么共同点？

translation.en: Honestly, I don't know.
translation.zh: 老实说 我不知道

translation.en: Well, you said you travel a lot for work,
translation.zh: 你之前说经常因为工作出差

translation.en: so maybe your submission could be about places you visited?
translation.zh:
也许你提交的作品
可以是你去过的地方？

translation.en: I don't really get to explore much while I'm working.
translation.zh: 我工作的时候不怎么出门闲逛

translation.en: As soon as I'm finished, it's on to the next.
translation.zh: 某个工作一完成 立刻就开始下一个

translation.en: My mom's favorite chair.
translation.zh: 我妈妈最喜欢的椅子

translation.en: She sat in that every Christmas while we opened up presents.
translation.zh:
她每年圣诞节都会坐在这把椅子上
看着我们打开礼物

translation.en: I like it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: This record player is cool.
translation.zh: 这个唱片机很帅气

translation.en: My mom, she was a singer with a great career.
translation.zh: 我妈妈是个事业有成的歌手

translation.en: She traveled all over the country from gig to gig,
translation.zh: 她在全国各地进行巡回演出

translation.en: even performed at Carnegie Hall.
translation.zh: 甚至在卡内基音乐厅演出过

translation.en: And that's where she met my father. He was in the orchestra there.
translation.zh:
她就是在那里认识我父亲的
他当时在管弦乐团工作

translation.en: So did you gain any of their musical abilities?
translation.zh:
那么你遗传到他们俩的
音乐天赋了吗？

translation.en: Hm. I can clap my hands to most songs?
translation.zh: 大部分的歌我都能鼓掌打拍子？

translation.en: You ever travel with them? Uh… No.
translation.zh:
-你和他们一起旅行过吗？
-没有

translation.en: Once I came around, they taught at a local college and that was it.
translation.zh:
我一出生 他们就在本地学院教书了
一切到此为止 不再进行巡演了

translation.en: Stopped touring.
translation.zh:
他们就在本地学院教书了
一切到此为止 不再进行巡演了

translation.en: -Do you think they regretted it? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你觉得他们对此后悔吗？
-是的

translation.en: I mean, I don't know. I would have.
translation.zh: 我说不好 要是我肯定后悔

translation.en: I love my career.
translation.zh: 我爱我的事业

translation.en: I thought you said that you weren't satisfied?
translation.zh: 你之前不是说心有不满吗？

translation.en: Yeah, maybe that was the wrong choice of word.
translation.zh: 是啊 也许那时我用词不对

translation.en: It's more like I'm unfulfilled.
translation.zh: 更像是还没有获得成就感

translation.en: You know, I'd rather be drawing by hand.
translation.zh: 其实我更愿意进行手绘

translation.en: Instead, I use a computer to create the architecture of choice
translation.zh: 但现在却使用计算机来创作 定制的公司总部或酒店建筑架构

translation.en: for corporate headquarters or hotels.
translation.zh: 定制的公司总部或酒店建筑架构

translation.en: And they pay me.
translation.zh: 人们为此付钱给我

translation.en: It beats having a real job.
translation.zh: 但这胜过拥有一份实际的工作

translation.en: Like being a chef.
translation.zh: 比如做主厨

translation.en: You know, I didn't mean it that way.
translation.zh: 你知道我不是那个意思

translation.en: Um… Cooking is an art form, isn't it?
translation.zh: 烹饪是一种艺术形式 不是吗？

translation.en: Sure. It can be.
translation.zh:
当然 可以这么说
但对我来说 这就是一份工作

translation.en: For me, it's a job.
translation.zh:
可以这么说
但对我来说 这就是一份工作

translation.en: Which is why you should be painting instead of cooking.
translation.zh: 所以你应该画画 而不是烹饪

translation.en: Easy for you to say, world-traveling artist.
translation.zh: 你说得容易 环游世界的大画家

translation.en: I don't think I could do what you do.
translation.zh: 我没有你的魄力

translation.en: Nothing brings me peace like being at home, especially at Christmas.
translation.zh:
没有什么能像待在家里一样
带给我安宁 尤其是在圣诞节期间

translation.en: Yeah. I agree with that.
translation.zh: 是啊 我同意 这就是我来这里的原因

translation.en: -Which is why I'm here. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我同意 这就是我来这里的原因

translation.en: Spend Christmas with David and with new people.
translation.zh: 跟大卫和新朋友 一起过圣诞节

translation.en: You know, um, I… I don't think these are all that random after all.
translation.zh: 其实 我觉得这些不是随便画出来的

translation.en: I bet you have a story about how each of these
translation.zh: 每幅画肯定都代表着

translation.en: was a part of your home growing up. Like the rocking chair?
translation.zh:
你成长过程中的某个故事
比如说这个摇椅？

translation.en: Has anyone ever told you you're very good at changing the subject?
translation.zh:
有没有人告诉过你
你很擅长改变话题？

translation.en: I have a Girl Scout patch in it.
translation.zh: 这方面我是有奖章的

translation.en: But look!
translation.zh: 但你看

translation.en: Yeah, you might be right.
translation.zh: 好吧 或许你说得对

translation.en: Maybe I can do something with this.
translation.zh: 也许我可以用这张画点什么

translation.en: About the painting in the gallery.
translation.zh: 关于画廊里的那幅画

translation.en: Yeah, it's… it's okay. You don't have to explain.
translation.zh: 是的 没关系 你不用解释

translation.en: Look, you're a talented artist and it wasn't my place to submit your work.
translation.zh:
你是个很有才华的画家
你的作品轮不到我来提交

translation.en: It's your painting and if you want to take it down,
translation.zh: 那是你的画作 如果你想拿下来 不需要我的同意

translation.en: you don't need my permission.
translation.zh: 如果你想拿下来 不需要我的同意

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: I'm taking it down.
translation.zh: 我要把它拿下来

translation.en: Hey, Charlotte.
translation.zh: 嘿 夏洛特

translation.en: Is everything okay? Uh… I need to talk to you.
translation.zh:
-都还好吧？
-我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 好啊 当然可以

translation.en: So, the anonymous painting?
translation.zh: 那副匿名画作？

translation.en: It's mine and I decided to take it down.
translation.zh: 是我画的 我决定把它拿下来

translation.en: Wyatt knows about it.
translation.zh: 怀亚特知道这件事

translation.en: It's yours?
translation.zh: 是你画的吗？

translation.en: Charlotte, I love it.
translation.zh: 夏洛特 我超爱这幅画

translation.en: That painting stands a good chance of winning the competition.
translation.zh: 那幅画很有可能赢得比赛

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
translation.zh: 你确定要这么做吗？

translation.en: Yes, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 是的 我确定

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: All right, well, if you change your mind,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你改变主意了

translation.en: you'll just have to resubmit it with a new application.
translation.zh: 就必须重新申请提交

translation.en: But using my own name, right?
translation.zh: 但用我自己的名字 对吧？

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: Submissions close on the day of the awards ceremony, the 23rd.
translation.zh: 颁奖典礼当天 也就是23号截止

translation.en: Charlotte.
translation.zh: 夏洛特

translation.en: I hope you submit something.
translation.zh: 我希望你能提交一幅作品

translation.en: You have real talent.
translation.zh: 你的才华毋庸置疑

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: -[David] Hello! -Hey.
translation.zh:
-你好！
-嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: So, uh… how's it coming?
translation.zh: 怎么样了？

translation.en: -[sighs] I'm still working on it. -Mm.
translation.zh: 还在努力

translation.en: Uh… You left this inside on the table.
translation.zh: 你把这个落在桌上了

translation.en: You missed a call… from London.
translation.zh: 你错过了伦敦打来的 一个电话

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So you and Charlotte?
translation.zh: 你和夏洛特是怎么回事？

translation.en: Yeah, I asked her to give me input on my festival submission.
translation.zh: 我请她为我的比赛作品提点建议

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: No, really. Charlotte has an inspired approach to art.
translation.zh: 真的 夏洛特在艺术方面充满灵感

translation.en: Please tell me there's something else to this other than "an inspired approach to art."
translation.zh:
拜托告诉我
你们之间不只是有“艺术灵感”

translation.en: -Of course there is. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-当然有
-好的

translation.en: She's fun, and she's different, and she's smart.
translation.zh: 她很有趣 与众不同 而且很聪明

translation.en: She might even understand my dreams better than I do.
translation.zh: 她可能比我更了解我的梦想

translation.en: I just don't know how I can make that work.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么做

translation.en: Try this: take her on a real date.
translation.zh: 这样吧 正经跟她约会一次

translation.en: Spend Christmas with her. Don't prejudge.
translation.zh: 跟她一起过圣诞节 不要自己瞎想

translation.en: Just realize you have a lot of time to think about this.
translation.zh:
你要知道
你有很多时间来考虑这件事

translation.en: My constant travel doesn't really leave room for meaningful relationships.
translation.zh:
我总是在旅行
没有时间踏实地谈恋爱

translation.en: You know it killed my last one.
translation.zh: 你知道我上次恋情就是这样黄的

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: But people approach things differently and will change for the right person.
translation.zh: 但是人们处理问题的方式不一样 会为正确的人做出改变

translation.en: My job isn't going to change.
translation.zh: 我的工作不会改变

translation.en: Just be open to it, okay?
translation.zh: 保持开放的心态 好吗？

translation.en: The call?
translation.zh: 那个电话？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 对 差点忘了

translation.en: London.
translation.zh: 伦敦

translation.en: Yes, I understand, but I'm not in a position
translation.zh: 是的 我理解 但是我无法

translation.en: to give you an answer right now. Let me get back to you.
translation.zh: 现在就做出答复 我会给你回电话

translation.en: Thank you for the offer.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的邀请

translation.en: -Whoa. -What's the scoop?
translation.zh:
-那个…
-是什么大新闻？

translation.en: The Hotel Magnifique could use my services.
translation.zh: 玛尼菲克酒店需要我的服务

translation.en: They want to commission drawings for all of their hotels.
translation.zh:
他们想委托我设计
他们所有酒店的图纸

translation.en: All of them.
translation.zh: 全部的酒店

translation.en: That's at least a six-month to a year job in London.
translation.zh: 那至少需要在伦敦工作半年到一年

translation.en: -Big money? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 钱给的多吗？ 是的

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: What are you going to do?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么办？

translation.en: They want to fly me down right after Christmas.
translation.zh: 他们想让我在圣诞节后马上飞过去

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: One thing's for sure…
translation.zh: 有一点是肯定的

translation.en: their timing stinks.
translation.zh: 这个项目来得真不是时候

translation.en: Charlotte.
translation.zh: 夏洛特

translation.en: What-- What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Were you up all night?
translation.zh: 你整晚都没睡吗？

translation.en: You took it down.
translation.zh:
-你把它画完了
-是的 我从中汲取到一点灵感

translation.en: Yeah, I saw something in it. I didn't intend to finish it.
translation.zh:
-你把它画完了
-是的 我从中汲取到一点灵感 我没想完成它 只是想实现那个灵感

translation.en: I just wanted to do that one thing. I just-- I couldn't stop.
translation.zh: 我没想完成它 只是想实现那个灵感 我停不下来 还没完全画好

translation.en: It's not done yet.
translation.zh: 我停不下来 还没完全画好

translation.en: Your mom sent me to wake you up.
translation.zh: 你妈妈派我来叫醒你

translation.en: -She did? -She wanted to let you sleep.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-她想让你继续睡

translation.en: Well, I did all the prep work.
translation.zh:
-我把准备工作都做完了
-我一定是没听到闹钟

translation.en: -I must've slept past my alarm. -It's okay.
translation.zh:
-我把准备工作都做完了
-我一定是没听到闹钟 没关系

translation.en: -I'm so, so, so sorry. -Oh, no, it's okay!
translation.zh: 太抱歉了 不 没关系

translation.en: Oh, so glad you're back. We're starting to get busy.
translation.zh: 很高兴你回来了 我们开始忙起来了

translation.en: We're on it. I will take the crab cakes.
translation.zh: 我们这就开始 我来做蟹饼

translation.en: Okay, I will take that.
translation.zh: 好的 我来做这个

translation.en: Honey, that's sugar. Are you trying something new?
translation.zh:
亲爱的 那是糖
你是在尝试新菜品吗？

translation.en: Oh, no. I just grabbed the wrong…
translation.zh: 糟糕 我拿错了…

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Uh, Charlotte, why don't we take five? Ella, kitchen's yours.
translation.zh:
夏洛特 我们出去谈谈吧
艾拉 厨房归你负责

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -I'm sorry I was late. -Figured I'd let you sleep.
translation.zh:
-对不起 我迟到了
-我想让你多睡会儿

translation.en: I was in the studio painting. I just felt so inspired.
translation.zh:
我一直在工作室画画 我只是觉得灵感勃发
我真的很需要完成它

translation.en: I really needed it.
translation.zh:
我只是觉得灵感勃发
我真的很需要完成它

translation.en: Is this about Wyatt?
translation.zh: 是因为怀亚特吗？

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许吧 是的

translation.en: Yes, um, but it's also about me.
translation.zh:
也许吧 是的 但也是为了我自己
我还没准备好和你谈这件事

translation.en: I'm just not ready to talk about it yet.
translation.zh:
但也是为了我自己
我还没准备好和你谈这件事

translation.en: Okay, well…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: you know I'm here if you need me.
translation.zh: 只要你需要 我随时都在

translation.en: Thanks, Mom. I'm ready to get back to cooking.
translation.zh: 谢谢 妈妈 我准备好回去做饭了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Is everything all right?
translation.zh: 都还好吧？

translation.en: I wish I knew.
translation.zh: 真希望我知道

translation.en: Tried giving her support, space, room to breathe.
translation.zh:
我试着给她提供支持
足够的空间和喘息的机会

translation.en: And look at her. She's more lost than ever.
translation.zh: 但看看她 她比之前还要迷茫

translation.en: Believe me, she's far from lost.
translation.zh: 相信我 她这完全不是迷茫

translation.en: I think she's finding her way.
translation.zh: 我认为她正在寻找自己的道路

translation.en: Really? I sure hope so.
translation.zh: 真的吗？希望如此

translation.en: Trust me. All Charlotte wants to do is make you proud.
translation.zh: 相信我 夏洛特只想让你为她骄傲

translation.en: [Patrick] Welcome. Welcome to the annual Christmas Art Festival Showcase.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到一年一度的圣诞艺术节展示

translation.en: Now, this year, our chosen artists are going to be decorating trees.
translation.zh:
今年 被我们选中的画家
要对圣诞树进行装饰

translation.en: So, watch as they create Christmas magic before your very eyes.
translation.zh: 请欣赏他们在你们眼前创造圣诞魔法

translation.en: Let the festivities begin!
translation.zh: 让庆祝活动开始吧

translation.en: You really outdid yourself this year, Patrick.
translation.zh: 你今年的表现更上一层楼 帕特里克

translation.en: The gallery looks fabulous.
translation.zh: 画廊看起来棒极了

translation.en: And I love the tree decorating.
translation.zh: 而且我喜欢装饰圣诞树

translation.en: Well, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And people are really talking about the food too.
translation.zh: 而且人们也在谈论食物

translation.en: And business is up, thanks to you and my daughter.
translation.zh:
多亏了你和我女儿
餐厅的生意愈加红火

translation.en: Speaking of Charlotte, I have an idea I'd like to run by you.
translation.zh: 说到夏洛特 我有个想法想说给你听听

translation.en: Looking to decorate that tree too?
translation.zh: 还想装饰那棵树吗？

translation.en: -Can you do it by computer? -Stop that.
translation.zh:
-可以用电脑吗？
-别闹了

translation.en: Yeah, I'm looking at all the art on the walls
translation.zh: 我在看墙上挂着的这些画作

translation.en: and some of this work is seriously impressive,
translation.zh: 有些作品真的很不错

translation.en: but nothing from my favorite artist yet.
translation.zh: 但其中并没有我最爱画家的作品

translation.en: Doesn't mean I'm not working on it.
translation.zh: 这并不代表我没在画

translation.en: Because of you, I am finishing my painting.
translation.zh: 多亏了你 我马上要完成那幅画了

translation.en: -That's great. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: I, on the other hand, am still unsure of what I want to draw.
translation.zh: 但我还是不确定自己想画什么

translation.en: Okay, I'm finding that very hard to believe.
translation.zh: 好吧 我很难相信这一点

translation.en: Can't a guy fish for more help from his favorite artist?
translation.zh:
难道就不能向自己最喜欢的画家
寻求更多帮助吗？

translation.en: I'd be grateful for any ideas.
translation.zh: 任何建议我都会感激不尽

translation.en: In that case, I know just the place to help you get fresh ideas
translation.zh: 那样的话 我知道一个地方 可以启发你获得新灵感 走出阴霾

translation.en: and shake you out of that funk.
translation.zh: 可以启发你获得新灵感 走出阴霾

translation.en: Meet me after I'm done here?
translation.zh: 等我下班后一起？

translation.en: -Can't say no to that. -Perfect.
translation.zh: 我无法拒绝 完美

translation.en: Well then.
translation.zh: 我来一块

translation.en: [Charlotte] You should check out the ornaments.
translation.zh: 你应该去看看那些装饰品

translation.en: -[Wyatt] Are they all personal? -They are.
translation.zh:
-都是私人的吗？
-是的

translation.en: [Charlotte] Every person writes down something they're grateful for every year.
translation.zh:
湾岸的每个居民
每年都会写下自己感恩的事情

translation.en: Reminds us that we're not going through life alone, you know?
translation.zh: 这提醒我们 人生在世 并非孤身一人

translation.en: And it's also tradition for couples to put up a joint ornament each year.
translation.zh:
每年情侣共同布置装饰品
也是一项传统

translation.en: And have you ever put up an ornament with anybody?
translation.zh: 你有没有和谁一起装饰过？

translation.en: I have. His name was Jeff.
translation.zh: 有过 他叫杰夫

translation.en: I won't be putting up another ornament with him.
translation.zh: 我不会再和他一起挂装饰了

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: We both grew up together here, and he couldn't wait to get out,
translation.zh:
我们在这里一起长大
他迫不及待地想离开这里

translation.en: and I needed to be here.
translation.zh: 但我需要留下

translation.en: He finally left a few Christmases ago.
translation.zh: 几年前 他终于离开了

translation.en: You've never wanted to leave? My mom needs me right now.
translation.zh:
-你从没想过离开这里？
-我妈妈现在需要我

translation.en: Well, I'd love to see what ornament you put up this year.
translation.zh: 我很想看看你今年挂了哪种装饰品

translation.en: You think you can find it?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能找到吗？

translation.en: -I think so. -All right. [laughs]
translation.zh:
-我觉得可以
-好吧

translation.en: Let's take a look.
translation.zh: 我们来看看

translation.en: Warmer.
translation.zh: 快到了

translation.en: Cold. Cold. Freezing, freezing, freezing.
translation.zh: 远了 更远了

translation.en: -"Flavor"? -Yeah, flavor. Seasoning.
translation.zh:
-“风味”？
-是啊 风味 调味

translation.en: I'm grateful for everything in my life. For the flavor everyone brings to it.
translation.zh:
我感恩生命中的一切
感恩每个人给我的人生带来新风味

translation.en: Well, if it means anything, you've already added flavor to my life.
translation.zh:
如果这么说有意义的话
你已经为我的人生添加了风味

translation.en: Goes both ways.
translation.zh: 对我来说 你也是

translation.en: So, do they let visitors participate?
translation.zh: 那游客可以参与活动吗？

translation.en: -Any unclaimed ornament can be yours. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-任何无人认领的饰物你都可以用
-好的

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I'm great.
translation.zh: 是的 我很好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: "Christmas in Bayside"?
translation.zh: “湾岸圣诞节”？

translation.en: It brought me here to see my friend David
translation.zh:
这让我来这里见到我的朋友大卫
并让我心有所感

translation.en: and gave me something personal, and I'm grateful.
translation.zh:
这让我来这里见到我的朋友大卫
并让我心有所感 我对此很是感激

translation.en: So my plan coming here worked?
translation.zh: 那我带你来这里的计划起效了吗？

translation.en: Better than you could ever know. You want to share?
translation.zh:
-效果远超你的想象
-你想和我说说吗？

translation.en: Hmm… Not yet.
translation.zh: 还不行

translation.en: And I'm grateful that Christmas in Bayside introduced me to you.
translation.zh: 我很感激湾岸的圣诞节让我认识了你

translation.en: You know, there's this awesome hot chocolate stand.
translation.zh: 那边有个很棒的热巧克力小摊

translation.en: Lead the way.
translation.zh: 带路吧

translation.en: [Charlotte] Wyatt, you in there?
translation.zh: 怀亚特 你在里面吗？

translation.en: -I did it. -Hey, someone had their morning coffee.
translation.zh: 我做到了 嘿 有人一大早就这么精力充沛

translation.en: I finished my painting.
translation.zh: 我画完了

translation.en: It's amazing. I couldn't wait for you to see it.
translation.zh:
-太棒了
-我等不及想让你看看

translation.en: Can I see yours?
translation.zh: 我能看看你的吗？

translation.en: Um… Not… not yet.
translation.zh: 还不行

translation.en: I'm going to be late to the restaurant, but I couldn't wait for you to see it.
translation.zh:
好吧 我要迟到了
但我就是等不及想让你看看

translation.en: -I love it. -I'll see you later?
translation.zh:
我非常喜欢 -我们回头见？
-好的 当然

translation.en: -Yeah, sure. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我们回头见？
-好的 当然

translation.en: Yay! [laughing]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Oh, good that you're here.
translation.zh: 你来得正好

translation.en: We were just discussing how to freshen up events,
translation.zh: 我们刚刚在讨论如何让活动焕然一新

translation.en: and I thought with such fabulous chefs on my team,
translation.zh:
我就想 既然我的团队中
有如此出色的厨师

translation.en: why not make tomorrow's open day a Christmas Cookie Decorating event?
translation.zh:
为什么不在明天的开放日
举办圣诞饼干装扮活动呢？

translation.en: Show families that art can be tasty too.
translation.zh: 让家人们知道 艺术也可以美味可口

translation.en: I like it, but I wanted to talk to you first.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个想法 但我想先跟你谈谈

translation.en: Well, as long as we have a day to prepare, I'd love to.
translation.zh:
只要我们能有一天的准备时间
我就没问题

translation.en: We could host it here between lunch and dinner when we're closed?
translation.zh:
我们要在午餐和晚餐之间
在餐厅举办这活动吗？

translation.en: That'd be okay with you?
translation.zh: 你觉得没问题吧？

translation.en: Like you don't want to make cookies. I already have ideas.
translation.zh:
-说得好像你不想做饼干似的
-我已经有想法了

translation.en: That's great! I'll fire up the publicity machine and fill this place up.
translation.zh:
太好了！我这就启动宣传机器
让这个地方人流如织

translation.en: I volunteer to get the ingredients. I know exactly how to do this.
translation.zh: 我去准备食材 我完全知道该怎么做

translation.en: -I'll go with you. -Okay!
translation.zh:
-我跟你一起去
-好的！

translation.en: Have fun!
translation.zh: 玩得开心！

translation.en: Thank you for being so accommodating.
translation.zh: 谢谢你如此通融

translation.en: I know. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 我知道 会很有趣的 我喜欢圣诞饼干

translation.en: I love Christmas cookies and this would be really good for the restaurant.
translation.zh: 我知道 会很有趣的 我喜欢圣诞饼干 而且这个活动对餐厅来说大有益处

translation.en: You could invite Wyatt.
translation.zh: 你可以邀请怀亚特

translation.en: You read my mind.
translation.zh: 你真懂我

translation.en: Ella did most of the prep on the cookies. She was really, really in her element.
translation.zh:
艾拉负责了饼干的大部分准备工作
她真的很在行

translation.en: -Should be fun. -Then I'll be there.
translation.zh:
应该很有趣 我肯定去 做饼干的技巧
打死我也不会错过

translation.en: I wouldn't miss cookie instruction for anything.
translation.zh:
我肯定去 做饼干的技巧
打死我也不会错过

translation.en: Did you get any work done today?
translation.zh:
-今天你的作品有进展吗？
-有

translation.en: I did, and, you know, I'm feeling very inspired.
translation.zh: 而且我觉得自己灵感满满

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Well, we have a full day tomorrow and I need my beauty rest, so…
translation.zh: 我们明天要忙一整天 我还要睡美容觉 所以…

translation.en: -No, you don't. -Stop.
translation.zh: 你不需要美容觉 别闹了

translation.en: I wouldn't think of it.
translation.zh: 那可不行

translation.en: -Wow. Nice crowd. You ready? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 哇哦 人可真多 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] I'm doing it with Ella. I wouldn't dream of doing it without her.
translation.zh:
我和艾拉一起举办
没有她我肯定不行

translation.en: Plus, she knows more about this than I do. I don't even know where to begin.
translation.zh:
而且她比我更了解这种事
我都不知道要从哪里入手

translation.en: Maybe you could start by not wearing the ingredients.
translation.zh:
也许你可以从
不要带着食材到处走开始

translation.en: Oh, my God. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 谢谢

translation.en: It's time to get started.
translation.zh: 该开始了

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 你能行的

translation.en: Thank you all for being here. Such a turnout.
translation.zh: 感谢各位的到来 居然来了这么多人

translation.en: Look at all of these beautiful families!
translation.zh: 看看这些神采奕奕的家人们！

translation.en: Today, we are going to be decorating Christmas cookies
translation.zh:
今天 我们将与湾岸的主厨
夏洛特威廉姆斯一道

translation.en: with Bayside's very own Chef Charlotte Williams!
translation.zh:
今天 我们将与湾岸的主厨
夏洛特威廉姆斯一道 装饰圣诞饼干！

translation.en: Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: I'll be joined by dessert chef extraordinaire, Chef Ella.
translation.zh: 杰出的甜点主厨艾拉会和我一起

translation.en: Now, every table has fresh baked cookies courtesy of Ella,
translation.zh: 每桌都有艾拉刚烤好的饼干

translation.en: as well as different frosting colors and candies to suit your artistic vision.
translation.zh:
以及不同的糖霜颜色和糖果
以满足你们的艺术需求

translation.en: So, let's all start with our Christmas tree cookie.
translation.zh: 我们开始装饰各自的圣诞饼干吧

translation.en: Do you guys all have one?
translation.zh: 你们都有饼干吧？

translation.en: While there's no wrong way to frost a cookie,
translation.zh:
怎么给饼干加糖霜都可以
但有一些技巧

translation.en: there are a few techniques to create something special.
translation.zh:
怎么给饼干加糖霜都可以
但有一些技巧 可以让你们创造出独特的样式

translation.en: So, let's learn how to feather the frosting to create pine needles.
translation.zh: 我们来学习一下如何羽化糖霜 以制作松针

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: The event is running long and we still have dinner service.
translation.zh:
这次活动持续时间有些久了
我们还有晚餐服务

translation.en: I told them that I would be the bad guy and clear everyone out.
translation.zh:
我告诉他们我来做那个坏人
让大家都离开

translation.en: I don't want to cost you money.
translation.zh: 我不想让你们亏钱

translation.en: We have a roomful of potential customers.
translation.zh: 我们这里满是潜在客户

translation.en: Let's see if they want to stay for dinner service.
translation.zh: 不如问问他们是否想留下来吃晚餐

translation.en: -That's genius. -[Molly] Half price!
translation.zh:
-天才的主意
-半价！

translation.en: Let's do it!
translation.zh: 就这么办

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: The fine folks here at Charlie's Kitchen
translation.zh: 查理厨房善良的店主

translation.en: have asked if you'd all like to stay for half-price dinner.
translation.zh: 询问大家是否愿意半价在这里吃晚餐

translation.en: What do you say? Anyone interested?
translation.zh: 你们怎么看？有人感兴趣吗？

translation.en: I'll get the oven prepped and sauces started for dinner service.
translation.zh: 我来给烤箱预热 开始预备酱汁

translation.en: -I'll get the rest. -I got the menus.
translation.zh: 剩下的我来负责 我去拿菜单

translation.en: And I will, uh, start setting tables.
translation.zh: 我去布置餐桌

translation.en: Your wait staff just saw the crowd. They look pretty happy.
translation.zh:
你的服务人员看到有这么多的人 -他们看起来很开心
-很好

translation.en: Great. I don't think we've been officially introduced.
translation.zh: 我们应该还没正式见过面

translation.en: I'm Molly, Charlotte's mom.
translation.zh: 我是莫莉 夏洛特的妈妈

translation.en: I'm Wyatt, and I see where she gets her good looks.
translation.zh:
我是怀亚特 现在我知道
她的美貌从哪里来的了

translation.en: -You can keep this one. -[Wyatt chuckles]
translation.zh: 这一个你可以留下

translation.en: -So, anything I can do to help? -Do you know how to wash dishes?
translation.zh:
有什么我能帮忙的吗？ 你会洗碗吗？
我们的洗碗工刚请病假了

translation.en: Our dishwasher just called in sick.
translation.zh:
你会洗碗吗？
我们的洗碗工刚请病假了

translation.en: Bring it on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Molly] I love a full house.
translation.zh: 我喜欢满座的状态

translation.en: That felt great. Better get used to it.
translation.zh:
-感觉很棒
-最好习惯一下

translation.en: This place is going to be packed again for the Gala tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 明天晚上的晚会 这里将会挤满人

translation.en: I think we can handle it.
translation.zh: 我想我们能应付得来

translation.en: I'm excited. Our chance for some real press.
translation.zh: 我好激动 终于得到正经的媒体宣传机会了

translation.en: So, how about a quick coffee before we call it a night? Hmm?
translation.zh:
在我们各自回家之前
很快地喝杯咖啡如何？

translation.en: -I think we all earned it. -I'll help you?
translation.zh:
-这是我们所有人应得的
-我来帮你

translation.en: Great night.
translation.zh: 美妙的一晚

translation.en: But I still have a lot of work to do when I get back to David's.
translation.zh:
但我回到大卫家后
还有很多工作要做

translation.en: -I thought you were on a roll? -I am.
translation.zh: 你不是进展顺利吗？ 没错 但我追求完美

translation.en: I just want it to be perfect.
translation.zh: 没错 但我追求完美

translation.en: Hey, you two.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们两个

translation.en: I forgot to say I'd love an extra shot of espresso with mine.
translation.zh: 我忘了说 我想加一小杯浓缩咖啡

translation.en: I'll go see if anyone else wants something special in theirs.
translation.zh: 我去看看其他人是否有特殊要求

translation.en: [clears throat] I like him.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: -Well, I'd like to talk to you about him. -I'm sure you would.
translation.zh:
-我想跟你谈谈他的事
-我就知道你要谈

translation.en: Okay, fine. I get it. New subject.
translation.zh: 好吧 我懂了 换个话题

translation.en: You still pulling all-nighters on your painting?
translation.zh: 你还在熬夜画画吗？

translation.en: No, I actually finished it last night, but I'm not submitting it.
translation.zh:
没有 我昨晚就完成了
但是我还没提交

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-真的

translation.en: I found something better to do with it.
translation.zh: 关于它的去处 我有了更好的主意

translation.en: I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.zh:
我要把这幅画作为圣诞礼物
送给怀亚特

translation.en: Now, let's get these coffees out there, right?
translation.zh: 我们把咖啡送出去吧

translation.en: Come on. I got it.
translation.zh: 走吧 我来拿

translation.en: Ella, Charlotte, get some rest. We have a big day tomorrow.
translation.zh:
艾拉 夏洛特 好好休息一下
我们明天会很忙

translation.en: -Wyatt, I hope we'll see you there? -I wouldn't miss it.
translation.zh:
-怀亚特 希望能在明晚见到你？
-我不会错过的

translation.en: We're going to take a walk.
translation.zh: 我们去散散步吧

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: You went above and beyond for me and my family tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚你为我和我的家人付出了很多

translation.en: All I did was washing dishes. You and Ella did all the heavy lifting.
translation.zh:
我只是洗碗而已
那些重活都是你和艾拉做的

translation.en: So, did you decide what you're gonna draw? I think you're going to like it.
translation.zh:
-你决定好要画什么了吗？
-我觉得你会喜欢的

translation.en: That's all you're going to say? You're going to make me pry it out of you?
translation.zh:
你要说的就这些？
你是要让我逼问你吗？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 到底是什么？

translation.en: Well, I can tell you it's better than I could have ever hoped.
translation.zh:
我能告诉你的是
最终作品要远高于我的预期

translation.en: -Okay. -You added what was missing.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-你补足了画作缺失的东西

translation.en: Really? What?
translation.zh: 真的吗？是什么？

translation.en: Flavor.
translation.zh: 风味

translation.en: That special inspiration only you could bring.
translation.zh: 只有你能带来的特殊灵感

translation.en: -Wow… -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: And what?
translation.zh: 然后什么？

translation.en: What is it? What are you drawing?
translation.zh: 是什么？你画的是什么？

translation.en: Okay, I get it. You're not talking.
translation.zh: 好吧 我明白了 你不会告诉我

translation.en: Charlotte, I want you to know I've been happier this past week
translation.zh:
夏洛特 我想让你知道 过去的一周
是我这么久以来最开心的一段时间

translation.en: than I've been in a very long time.
translation.zh:
过去的一周
是我这么久以来最开心的一段时间

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Okay, I need the right red. The right red.
translation.zh: 好的 我需要红色 恰如其分的红色
