translation.en: Christmas red.
translation.zh: 圣诞红

translation.en: You talk to yourself a lot when you paint? What are you doing here?
translation.zh:
-你画画的时候经常自言自语？
-你怎么在这里？

translation.en: Gabe suggested I come talk to you.
translation.zh: 加布建议我来找你谈谈

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: He got tired of me telling him how worried I was about you.
translation.zh: 他厌倦了我跟他倾诉 我有多担心你

translation.en: He has a point.
translation.zh: 他说得有道理

translation.en: I've been trying to set you up with guys since Jeff,
translation.zh:
自从杰夫之后
我一直试图撮合你和其他人

translation.en: and I'm worried you've fallen for someone who's gonna leave.
translation.zh:
我担心你会喜欢上一个
注定要离开的人

translation.en: And, you know, he is leaving.
translation.zh: 而且他肯定要离开

translation.en: I mean, it has occurred to me.
translation.zh: 我也想到了这点 但是…

translation.en: -But! -But what?
translation.zh: 我也想到了这点 但是… 但是什么？

translation.en: But I think we actually have something here,
translation.zh:
但是我认为
我们之间其实有某种羁绊

translation.en: and I want to believe that he would actually want to stay.
translation.zh: 我愿意相信 他是想留下来的

translation.en: Honey!
translation.zh: 亲爱的！

translation.en: He got me painting like I did when I first discovered it.
translation.zh:
他给了我最开始作画时
曾经有的那种灵感

translation.en: He did this!
translation.zh: 都是他的功劳！

translation.en: This is more than my happy place.
translation.zh: 画画不止是我的乐园

translation.en: It's… it's where I belong.
translation.zh: 也是我的归宿

translation.en: -I've known that for quite some time. -You could have told me.
translation.zh: 我早就知道了 你应该告诉我的

translation.en: Is there really more than one color red?
translation.zh: 红色还分很多种类吗？

translation.en: So what I'm looking for is Rosso Corsa red?
translation.zh: 我要找的是玫瑰红？

translation.en: A bright, beautiful, brilliant Christmas red.
translation.zh:
一种亮丽、美妙
令人眼前一亮的圣诞红

translation.en: It's a funny name.
translation.zh: 这个名字很有趣

translation.en: -Italian sports car red. -Oh, pardon me.
translation.zh:
意大利跑车红 -听不懂了
-我这里应该有这种颜色

translation.en: -I have a tube here somewhere. -I'll help you find it.
translation.zh:
-听不懂了
-我这里应该有这种颜色 -我帮你找吧
-等等

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh:
-我帮你找吧
-等等

translation.en: I don't want to keep you, we have to prep for the Gala in the morning.
translation.zh:
我不想让你久留
我们明早还要为晚会做准备

translation.en: We do, but first we need to find your red. -What's it called again? -[Charlotte giggles]
translation.zh:
是的 但首先要找到你要的红色
叫什么来着？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Hey, buddy. I'm heading to bed. Can I get you anything?
translation.zh:
嘿 伙计 我要去睡觉了
你还需要什么吗？

translation.en: Nah, you've done more than enough.
translation.zh: 不用了 你已经做得够多的了

translation.en: You know, I'm watching your work,
translation.zh: 说起来 我看着你工作的样子

translation.en: and it just reminds me of the loft in New York.
translation.zh: 就想起过去在纽约的那个阁楼

translation.en: [chuckles] Crazy Wyatt working until the middle of the night.
translation.zh: 狂人怀亚特工作到半夜

translation.en: You know, I feel like Crazy Wyatt.
translation.zh: 我现在感觉就是狂人怀亚特附体

translation.en: Yeah, well, women can do that to you.
translation.zh: 是啊 女人会对你产生这种影响

translation.en: Yeah, she is the nicest person I've ever met.
translation.zh: 是啊 她是我见过最贴心的人

translation.en: -Mm. -And I've been a lot of places.
translation.zh: 而且我也算是见多识广了

translation.en: I guess it would be safe to say that you found your muse?
translation.zh:
你找到了自己的缪斯
这么说应该不为过吧？

translation.en: I think more.
translation.zh: 我认为不仅如此

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: [Wyatt] Not bad, huh?
translation.zh: 还不错吧？

translation.en: -Great work, buddy. Great work. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 超棒 伙计 超棒

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Making your butternut squash risotto. I added a few extras of my own.
translation.zh:
做胡桃南瓜烩饭
我自己加了几种调料

translation.en: I never did finish a good version of this.
translation.zh: 这道菜我就没做好过

translation.en: I just kept getting distracted and messing it up.
translation.zh: 我老分心 结果总是徒劳无功

translation.en: Well, your heart wasn't in it, but I love the idea, plus it turned out amazing.
translation.zh:
你的心没在这上面
但我喜欢这个主意 再说了 结果棒极了

translation.en: Here, try.
translation.zh: 来尝尝

translation.en: This is incredible. We need to serve this tonight.
translation.zh:
味道太不可思议了
我们今晚一定要上这道菜

translation.en: With an herb chicken breast. We making progress?
translation.zh:
-配上香草鸡胸肉
-有进展了吗？

translation.en: We were discussing what to serve tonight at the Gala.
translation.zh: 我们在讨论晚会的菜谱

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Ella's butternut squash risotto with herb chicken is Christmas on a plate.
translation.zh:
艾拉的胡桃南瓜烩饭配香草鸡胸
简直是圣诞绝配

translation.en: -Ella's? -Really?
translation.zh: 艾拉的？ 真的吗？

translation.en: Really. This is your happy place.
translation.zh: 真的 这里是你的乐园

translation.en: Well, it's your call. You're the head chef.
translation.zh: 你来决定 毕竟你是主厨

translation.en: I will get back to decorating so you can cook.
translation.zh: 我继续去做装饰了 你们踏实做饭

translation.en: You have no idea what this means to me.
translation.zh: 你不知道这对我意味着什么

translation.en: Trust me. I absolutely do.
translation.zh: 相信我 我完全知道

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You concentrate, you get the perfect delicious chicken.
translation.zh:
只要集中注意力
就能得到最美味的鸡肉

translation.en: -Been cooking chicken since I was ten. -You've been painting since you were nine.
translation.zh:
-我十岁就开始做鸡肉了
-你从九岁就开始画画了

translation.en: -You need to tell your mother. -I know.
translation.zh:
-你得告诉你妈妈
-我知道

translation.en: -You can't tell them apart. -That's the point.
translation.zh:
-无法区分这两盘
-要的就是这种效果

translation.en: I learned from the best. You are a terrific cook.
translation.zh:
我的老师可是业界佼佼者
你是个很厉害的厨师

translation.en: Sometimes the student surpasses the teacher.
translation.zh: 有时候 青出于蓝而胜于蓝

translation.en: Trouble?
translation.zh: 有麻烦了？

translation.en: Email from my friend in London.
translation.zh: 我在伦敦的朋友发来了邮件

translation.en: Double the money of the original offer
translation.zh: 圣诞节后那天的伦敦头等舱机票

translation.en: and first-class tickets to London the day after Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞节后那天的伦敦头等舱机票 以及报价翻倍

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Well, you're going to have to answer them.
translation.zh: 你得给他们一个回复

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 是啊 我知道

translation.en: I can't believe it, there is not a sour face in the room.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 这里的人都很开心

translation.en: At this rate, we are guaranteed to be in every article and blog.
translation.zh:
照这样下去
我们肯定能登上各大报纸和博客

translation.en: Do you think they'll want my photo? Do I look okay?
translation.zh:
你觉得他们会想要我的照片吗？
我看起来可以吗？

translation.en: You look beautiful.
translation.zh: 你看起来很美

translation.en: And if they don't want your picture, I do.
translation.zh: 如果他们不想要你的照片 我想要

translation.en: We just might have pulled it off.
translation.zh: 我想我们成功了

translation.en: There's not one plate with a single grain of rice left on it.
translation.zh: 盘子里的烩饭都被一扫而空

translation.en: All thanks to you. You made the right call.
translation.zh: 多亏了你 你做出了正确的决定

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了

translation.en: I'll go check in with your mom and see if there's anything else.
translation.zh: 我去问问你妈妈 看看还需要什么

translation.en: I know I'm probably not supposed to be back here now, but I need to talk to you.
translation.zh:
我可能不该在这时候来这里
但是我需要和你谈谈

translation.en: No, I'm glad you are. There are dishes to wash.
translation.zh:
不 我很高兴你能来
还有盘子需要洗呢

translation.en: Absolutely. Grab me an apron.
translation.zh: 没问题 帮我拿条围裙

translation.en: I'm kidding. We have help, but I love that you were so ready to go.
translation.zh:
我开玩笑的 我们有人帮忙
但我很开心你整装待发

translation.en: Unfortunately, that's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 这就是我来这里的原因

translation.en: I have a job in London after Christmas,
translation.zh: 我圣诞节后在伦敦有个工作

translation.en: and I wanted to be completely transparent with you.
translation.zh: 我想和你完全坦诚相待

translation.en: I also wanted to ask if you would wanna--
translation.zh: 我也想问你 你是否…

translation.en: No, no, it's fine. It's… it's fine.
translation.zh: 不 没关系的…

translation.en: Like… it's not that I wasn't expecting this.
translation.zh: 我对这件事有心理准备

translation.en: I mean, it's just a bit more abrupt and direct than I was expecting.
translation.zh: 只是这比我预想的 更突然和直接了当

translation.en: But you're you.
translation.zh: 但这就是你

translation.en: You're… you're great. You're in demand.
translation.zh: 你太厉害了 大家需要你

translation.en: Um… I'll be fine. I…
translation.zh: 我会没事的 我…

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: -Uh… Are you staying for the contest? -Charlotte!
translation.zh:
-你要留下来参加比赛吗？
-夏洛特！

translation.en: -They want a photo of all three of us. -Not right now.
translation.zh: 他们想要我们三人的合影！ 现在不行

translation.en: You made a huge difference in my life.
translation.zh: 你完全改变了我的人生

translation.en: Thank you for that.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你做了什么？

translation.en: Charlotte, wait. Look, I wasn't trying to hurt you.
translation.zh: 夏洛特 等等 听着 我并不是想伤害你

translation.en: You didn't let me tell you the rest of my news.
translation.zh: 你没让我说完

translation.en: Look, you have a "vagabond" life.
translation.zh: 听着 你过着居无定所的生活

translation.en: I have a "find a place you love and stay" kind of life.
translation.zh: 而我过着安居乐业的生活

translation.en: -Oil and water. -It doesn't have to be.
translation.zh:
我们注定不能相融 -不一定要这样
-就得这样

translation.en: Yeah, it does.
translation.zh:
-不一定要这样
-就得这样

translation.en: You know, for a moment there, I had dreams of you staying,
translation.zh:
其实有那么一瞬间
我还幻想你会留下

translation.en: working from here.
translation.zh: 在这里工作

translation.en: I shouldn't have. I knew better.
translation.zh: 我就不应该做这种白日梦 我怎么就是不长教训

translation.en: But you did teach me something that I'm so grateful for.
translation.zh:
但你确实教会了我一件事
对此我很感激 是什么？

translation.en: That my art is something special. It is.
translation.zh:
-我的画作独一无二
-确实如此

translation.en: And I intend to keep pursuing it.
translation.zh: 我打算继续在这条道路上探索

translation.en: That's what I was trying to tell you. You can come with me.
translation.zh: 这就是我想告诉你的 你可以跟我一起走

translation.en: To London?
translation.zh: 去伦敦？

translation.en: I'm hoping you'll say yes.
translation.zh: 我希望你能答应

translation.en: This could be your chance to start fresh as an artist without anything holding you back.
translation.zh:
你可以重新开始做一名画家
没有后顾之忧

translation.en: Wyatt, this is my home.
translation.zh: 怀亚特 这里是我的家

translation.en: But you're stuck here doing something with your life you don't love.
translation.zh: 但你被困在这里 做你不喜欢的事

translation.en: No, I'm not.
translation.zh: 不 不是这样

translation.en: Being a chef isn't my life. You helped me understand that.
translation.zh: 当厨师不是我生活的全部 你让我明白了这点

translation.en: I'm an artist. That's what I am.
translation.zh: 我是个画家 这才是真正的我

translation.en: But I can't go with you.
translation.zh: 但我不能跟你一起走

translation.en: And if this London job is your dream that you need to follow,
translation.zh:
如果伦敦这份工作
是你需要追逐的梦想

translation.en: I don't get in the way of dreams.
translation.zh: 我不想成为你追梦路上的绊脚石

translation.en: I know how important they are.
translation.zh: 我知道梦想有多重要

translation.en: -Charlotte, just… -Goodbye, Wyatt.
translation.zh:
-夏洛特 你…
-再见 怀亚特

translation.en: I wasn't expecting to see you here today, you know, after last night.
translation.zh: 我没想到你今天会来餐厅 毕竟昨晚发生了那件事

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you, but your door was closed.
translation.zh: 我想和你谈谈 但你的房门是关着的

translation.en: I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的好意

translation.en: That's my favorite.
translation.zh: 这是我最喜爱的一幅画

translation.en: But there are quite a few others in that studio of yours
translation.zh: 但你的工作室里还有很多

translation.en: that are really quite beautiful.
translation.zh: 也同样非常美妙的作品

translation.en: Really? You noticed?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你注意到了？

translation.en: Of course I noticed. You're my daughter. I love everything you do.
translation.zh: 我当然注意到了 你是我女儿 我喜欢你做的一切

translation.en: I always thought you considered them a hobby.
translation.zh:
我一直以为
你觉得画画只是我的爱好

translation.en: I did, and I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 我以前是这么想 而且我很抱歉

translation.en: I have something I want to show you.
translation.zh: 我有东西想给你看

translation.en: You leaving?
translation.zh: 你要走了？

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I took the London job. Just called and got an earlier flight.
translation.zh:
我接下了伦敦的工作
刚刚打的电话 预定了早班的机票

translation.en: What? Whoa, hang on. Whoa.
translation.zh: 什么？等一下 哇哦

translation.en: You're leaving before Christmas?
translation.zh: 等等…你要在圣诞节前离开？

translation.en: What about Charlotte? What about the contest?
translation.zh: 那夏洛特呢？比赛呢？

translation.en: The contest?
translation.zh: 比赛？

translation.en: I started off doing it for me, I ended up doing it for her and…
translation.zh:
我一开始是为了我自己参赛
结果成了为她 现在…

translation.en: now she's gone.
translation.zh: 现在她不在了

translation.en: Gone? Wait, hold-- What happened?
translation.zh: 不在了？等等 发生什么事了？

translation.en: I told her about London.
translation.zh: 我跟她说了伦敦的事

translation.en: When… when you got here, you were complaining to me
translation.zh: 听着 你刚到这里的时候 向我抱怨自己的艺术作品变成了

translation.en: about how you felt like your art had become
translation.zh: 向我抱怨自己的艺术作品变成了

translation.en: this computer-generated business.
translation.zh: 向我抱怨自己的艺术作品变成了 电脑制作的生意

translation.en: You weren't happy artistically.
translation.zh: 你在艺术方面并不开心 好吗？

translation.en: Okay? But I've watched you since you got here.
translation.zh:
但自从你来到这里
我就一直观察着你

translation.en: When you were making this, you were smiling.
translation.zh: 你在画这幅画的时候 面带微笑

translation.en: Heck! Even when you weren't working on this, you were smiling.
translation.zh: 即使没在画画的时候 你也满面笑容

translation.en: Do you know why that is? No, I'll tell you why.
translation.zh:
你知道为什么吗？
不知道吗？我来告诉你原因

translation.en: It's not because of the art.
translation.zh: 这并不是因为绘画本身

translation.en: It's because of her.
translation.zh: 而是因为她

translation.en: -You know, I asked her to come with me. -Great.
translation.zh:
-我邀请她和我一起走
-很好

translation.en: She said no.
translation.zh: 她拒绝了

translation.en: And did she tell you why she said no?
translation.zh: 她告诉过你为什么要拒绝吗？

translation.en: This is her home.
translation.zh: 这里是她的家

translation.en: This is where she wants to be.
translation.zh: 是她想待的地方

translation.en: Sometimes we just need to learn to get out of our own way, Wyatt.
translation.zh:
有时 我们要学会摆脱自己的习惯
怀亚特

translation.en: Just hold on to the things that make you happy.
translation.zh: 只需抓住让你开心的事物就好

translation.en: Okay? Everything else is just going to fall into place.
translation.zh: 好吗？其他一切都会水到渠成

translation.en: I tried.
translation.zh: 我试过了

translation.en: Thank you for everything, man.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你所做的一切 兄弟
-不客气

translation.en: -Of course. -It's really good to see you again.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你所做的一切 兄弟
-不客气 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Now…
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: I better go before…
translation.zh: 我最好出发 以免…

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: One more thing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: Make sure she gets this.
translation.zh: 一定要把这个交给她

translation.en: See you.
translation.zh: 再见 （夏洛特）

translation.en: Hey, wait! What am I supposed to…
translation.zh: 嘿 等等！我该怎么

translation.en: do with this?
translation.zh: 处理这幅画？

translation.en: Wait, did you…
translation.zh: 等等 你有没有…

translation.en: Is this the unfinished painting that everyone's talking about?
translation.zh:
这就是大家交口议论的
那幅未完成的画吗？

translation.en: This is the one I threw in the trash. And I'm really glad I did.
translation.zh:
就是被我扔进垃圾桶的那幅
我很高兴我那么做了

translation.en: It is spectacular.
translation.zh: 简直太棒了

translation.en: You really are a special talent.
translation.zh: 你的天赋确实独一无二

translation.en: I can't enter this one.
translation.zh: 我不能提交这幅画

translation.en: I won't.
translation.zh: 我不会提交的

translation.en: I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.zh:
我要把这幅画作为圣诞礼物
送给怀亚特

translation.en: So I painted a different one.
translation.zh: 于是我又画了一幅

translation.en: It's called Christmas at Charlie's.
translation.zh: 叫做《查理餐厅的圣诞节》

translation.en: Honey, it is magnificent.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这也太棒了

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: I can't be both a painter and a head chef.
translation.zh: 我不能兼任画家和主厨

translation.en: Believe me, I have tried.
translation.zh: 相信我 我试过了

translation.en: I am sorry if the pressures of running the restaurant
translation.zh: 如果经营餐厅的压力让你感觉

translation.en: made you feel like you weren't allowed to follow your dreams.
translation.zh: 不能去追求自己的梦想 我很抱歉

translation.en: I don't regret one second of it.
translation.zh: 我一点都不后悔

translation.en: It's our family's legacy.
translation.zh: 这是我们家的传承

translation.en: The restaurant will be fine, and I will be fine.
translation.zh: 餐厅会没事的 我也会没事的

translation.en: What I need most is for my daughter to do what she loves.
translation.zh:
我最需要的是
让我女儿去做她喜欢的事

translation.en: Now, I hope you're entering this one.
translation.zh: 现在 我希望你能提交这幅作品

translation.en: I most certainly am.
translation.zh: 我肯定会的

translation.en: And I really want you to be at the awards ceremony.
translation.zh: 我真的希望你能参加颁奖典礼

translation.en: I need your support.
translation.zh: 我需要你的支持

translation.en: Okay, I'm going to go clear my head.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要去清醒一下

translation.en: I'm going to go to the Christmas tree and add another ornament.
translation.zh: 我再去圣诞树那里挂个饰品

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry about Wyatt.
translation.zh: 怀亚特的事我很遗憾

translation.en: It's sad, but I'm a better person now that I knew him.
translation.zh:
是很令人难过
但认识他之后 我成为了更好的自己

translation.en: And I like that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这样

translation.en: Charlotte!
translation.zh: 夏洛特！

translation.en: David, hi! You're putting up an ornament, nice.
translation.zh: 大卫 嗨 你来挂装饰品 真好

translation.en: No. Um… no, no.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: Uh… Wyatt left this at my place. I brought it to show you.
translation.zh:
怀亚特把这个留在了我家
我给你带过来了

translation.en: You know, he is more than grateful for you.
translation.zh: 要知道 他对你不只是感激之情

translation.en: I mean, the drawing he did for the contest, you need to see it.
translation.zh: 他为比赛画的那幅画 你得看看

translation.en: Where is it?
translation.zh: 在哪里？

translation.en: He left it at my place.
translation.zh: 他把它留在我家了

translation.en: You know, I thought I had it all figured out before he got here.
translation.zh: 他来之前 我以为自己都想清楚了

translation.en: But I quit my job and I'm dedicating my life to painting.
translation.zh:
但现在我辞掉了工作
决定把一生都献给画画

translation.en: He gave that to me.
translation.zh: 是他影响了我

translation.en: That's incredible.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: Can I… Can I show you what you gave to him?
translation.zh: 我能给你看看你带给他的影响吗？

translation.en: Well, what are we waiting on?
translation.zh: 那我们还在等什么？

translation.en: -Great. -[gasps] Hold on.
translation.zh:
-没问题
-等一下

translation.en: He's not going to, like, jump out or anything, is he?
translation.zh: 他不会突然从哪里跳出来吧？

translation.en: No. No, he's gone.
translation.zh: 不会 不会 他已经走了

translation.en: Gone, like gone?
translation.zh: 走了 真的走了？

translation.en: I thought he was going to at least stay to enter the contest.
translation.zh: 我以为他至少会留下来参加比赛

translation.en: No. No, he left.
translation.zh: 不 他走了

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是

translation.en: not entirely.
translation.zh: 也没有彻底离开

translation.en: He wanted you to have it.
translation.zh: 他想把这个送给你

translation.en: I had no idea.
translation.zh: 我完全不知道

translation.en: David, I… I can't accept this.
translation.zh: 大卫 我不能接受这幅画

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because every time I look at it, I just…
translation.zh: 因为我每次看到它 就会…

translation.en: will be reminded that he's gone.
translation.zh: 它都会让我想起他已经离去的事实

translation.en: You know, he said you were his muse.
translation.zh: 其实 他说你是他的缪斯女神

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I'm glad I got to see it.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能看到这幅画

translation.en: Thanks again. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 再次感谢 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 夏洛特

translation.en: Just the person I'm looking for.
translation.zh: 我正巧在找你呢

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh:
你好 我只是想确保
昨晚的晚会结束后

translation.en: I just wanted to make sure everything was back in order after the Gala last night.
translation.zh:
你好 我只是想确保
昨晚的晚会结束后 一切都恢复正常 艾拉 要是没有你 我可怎么办？

translation.en: Ella, what would I do without you?
translation.zh: 艾拉 要是没有你 我可怎么办？

translation.en: What would I do without all of this?
translation.zh: 没有这一切 我该怎么办？

translation.en: You have been a rock since you first got here,
translation.zh:
自从你初来这里
就一直是我们的中流砥柱

translation.en: and I think it's time you get the credit you deserve.
translation.zh: 我认为是时候让你得到应得的认可了

translation.en: Charlotte has decided to pursue her painting,
translation.zh: 夏洛特决定追求绘画事业

translation.en: and I am in the market for a new head chef.
translation.zh: 我需要一位新主厨

translation.en: You are just what this restaurant needs. The job is yours if you want it.
translation.zh:
你正是这家餐厅需要的人
如果你同意 这份工作是你的了

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes! I just-- That was a position you wanted to keep in the family.
translation.zh:
我当然愿意 我只是…
我以为这个职位只会由家族成员担任

translation.en: You don't think you're family?
translation.zh: 你觉得自己不是我的家人吗？

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Now get your coat.
translation.zh: 好了 拿上你的外套

translation.en: You and I have an awards ceremony to get ready for on Charlotte's request.
translation.zh:
应夏洛特的要求
我们俩要准备去参加一个颁奖典礼

translation.en: What about dinner service prep?
translation.zh: 那晚饭服务的准备工作呢？

translation.en: Oh, you have staff for that now. They know what to do.
translation.zh:
你现在有下属来做这些了
他们知道该怎么做

translation.en: We'll be back before the first diner.
translation.zh:
我们会在第一个晚餐顾客
到来之前回来

translation.en: -[laughing] -Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: I'm glad you changed your mind.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你改变主意了

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: I called London back.
translation.zh: 我给伦敦那边回了电话

translation.en: Turned down the job.
translation.zh: 拒绝了那份工作

translation.en: You did?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: I sure did.
translation.zh: 确实如此

translation.en: -I love it. It's amazing. -It's the reason I couldn't leave.
translation.zh:
我很喜欢这幅画 -棒极了
-这就是我无法离开的原因

translation.en: The reason I drew it.
translation.zh: 也是我画下它的原因

translation.en: I can't stop thinking about you.
translation.zh: 我无法停止对你的思念

translation.en: I can't stop thinking about you either.
translation.zh: 我也无法停止对你的思念

translation.en: And this.
translation.zh: 还有这幅画

translation.en: This right here.
translation.zh: 就是这幅

translation.en: This is your heart on a canvas.
translation.zh: 画布上满载你的真心

translation.en: You're meant to do this.
translation.zh: 你命中注定要成为画家

translation.en: So are you.
translation.zh: 你也是如此

translation.en: -Charlotte and Wyatt? I thought… -[Patrick] Is something wrong?
translation.zh:
夏洛特和怀亚特？我以为… -有什么问题吗？
-显然没有

translation.en: Apparently not.
translation.zh:
-有什么问题吗？
-显然没有

translation.en: I have so many questions, but I know better than to ask right now.
translation.zh:
我有很多疑问
但我知道最好现在不要问

translation.en: I'm gonna go look at some art.
translation.zh: 我要去看看这些画作

translation.en: You know, I've been doing some thinking,
translation.zh: 其实 我一直在考虑

translation.en: and I believe that it would greatly benefit all parties involved
translation.zh:
其实 我一直在考虑 我认为 如果查理厨房
今后能够成为节日活动的

translation.en: if Charlie's Kitchen were to become
translation.zh:
我认为 如果查理厨房
今后能够成为节日活动的 官方食物供应商
将会给相关各方都带来极大的好处

translation.en: the festival's official food supplier from now on.
translation.zh:
官方食物供应商
将会给相关各方都带来极大的好处

translation.en: We'd have to work very closely on it, of course.
translation.zh: 当然了 我们必须密切合作

translation.en: Well, I happen to know the owner of the restaurant,
translation.zh: 好吧 我恰巧认识这家餐厅的老板

translation.en: and maybe you would like to join her for dinner there sometime.
translation.zh: 也许你可以找时间和她共进晚餐

translation.en: I would like that very much.
translation.zh: 我非常乐意

translation.en: It was my family's dream to make Charlie's Kitchen
translation.zh: 让查理厨房 成为社区的中心是我家人的梦想

translation.en: the heart of the community,
translation.zh: 成为社区的中心是我家人的梦想

translation.en: to make it feel like home for anyone who stepped inside.
translation.zh: 让所有顾客都有宾至如归的感觉

translation.en: Whatever I do in my life, wherever I go,
translation.zh: 不管我以后做什么 不管我去到那里

translation.en: Charlie's Kitchen will always hold a special place in my heart.
translation.zh:
查理厨房将永远在我心中
占有特殊的位置

translation.en: They didn't ask anything because they know you're the winner.
translation.zh:
他们没向你提问
因为他们已经知道你是获胜者

translation.en: We'll see.
translation.zh: 我们等着瞧

translation.en: How many finished paintings do you have not hanging in the restaurant?
translation.zh:
你还有多少幅成品画
没有挂在餐厅里？

translation.en: Hmm. That I'd want seen? Maybe over a dozen?
translation.zh: 我觉得能看的？估计有十几幅？

translation.en: Then you have enough to have your own showing.
translation.zh:
那你有足够的作品
可以开一次个人画展了

translation.en: Would that make you happy? I know the owner here.
translation.zh: 这会让你开心吗？我认识这里的老板

translation.en: That would be a dream come true.
translation.zh: 那我就是美梦成真了

translation.en: But what about you? We could show our art together.
translation.zh:
但你呢？
我们可以一起展示我们的画作

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: you're my dream come true.
translation.zh: 你就是我的美梦成真

translation.en: But I'd love that.
translation.zh: 但我很乐意那么做

translation.en: The results are in.
translation.zh: 结果出来了

translation.en: All right, before I announce the winner,
translation.zh: 好了 在宣布获胜者之前

translation.en: I just want to acknowledge all of the incredible talents
translation.zh:
我要感谢查理厨房
那几位才华横溢的人

translation.en: over at Charlie's Kitchen who've stepped up for us
translation.zh:
我要感谢查理厨房
那几位才华横溢的人 她们在整个圣诞周期间救我们于水火

translation.en: this entire Christmas week.
translation.zh: 她们在整个圣诞周期间救我们于水火

translation.en: Let's give them a big round of applause.
translation.zh: 让我们向她们报以热烈的掌声

translation.en: And now, without further ado,
translation.zh: 好了 话不多说

translation.en: the winner of this year's Christmas art competition is…
translation.zh: 今年圣诞艺术大赛的获胜者是…

translation.en: With a remarkable personal piece,
translation.zh: 该名参赛者提交了非凡的个人作品

translation.en: the award goes to…
translation.zh: 我在此将奖项颁发给…

translation.en: Charlotte Williams!
translation.zh: 夏洛特威廉姆斯！

translation.en: I thought for sure you were gonna win. I didn't enter the drawing.
translation.zh:
-我以为你一定会赢
-我没提交这幅画

translation.en: Too personal.
translation.zh: 内容太私人了

translation.en: Besides, it's yours, not mine, to enter.
translation.zh: 再说了 这是你的画像 我没权利提交

translation.en: I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Thank you for all the flavor you add to my life.
translation.zh: 谢谢你给我的生活增添了各种风味

translation.en: -Okay, you win. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吧 你赢了

translation.en: Oh, I know. I have you.
translation.zh: 我知道 我有你在身边

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 夏洛特

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Wyatt.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 怀亚特
